Caiphon's Disquieting Liberty.flavor: You call out to Caiphon, the Dream Whisperer, an entity who is both unimaginably far and worryingly close. Caiphon gives you your liberty, but sips a bit of your life in return.
Caiphon's Disquieting Liberty.effect: Choose one of the following conditions that you currently suffer: immobilized, restrained, or slowed. That condition immediately ends. However, you also take 5 damage.

Delban's Eye.name: Delban's Eye
Delban's Eye.flavor: A slanting shaft of frigid starlight shines down and illuminates your foe, revealing it in a spasm of chill agony. Your foe realizes you’ ve turned the dire attention of a fell entity upon it.
Delban's Eye.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn. The target loses concealment and total concealment while marked.
Delban's Eye.starPact: All attacks against the target deal 1d6 + your Charisma modifier extra cold damage while the target is marked by this power.

Dark Side of the Moon.name: Dark Side of the Moon
Dark Side of the Moon.flavor: The moon, waning gibbous, swims into view overhead, but something is wrong. Its craters host eyes larger than seas, and the fracture lines writhe and crawl, revealing themselves as continent-sized tentacles.
Dark Side of the Moon.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed and restricted to making basic attacks until the end of your next turn.

Ulban's Shining Cloak.name: Ulban's Shining Cloak
Ulban's Shining Cloak.flavor: The blue-white fire of Ulban sears your flesh with a flash of otherworldly light, but grants you an extra measure of protection against the attacks of distant foes.
Ulban's Shining Cloak.trigger: You are hit by a ranged attack.
Ulban's Shining Cloak.effect: You gain a power bonus to the defense targeted by the attack equal to your Intelligence modifier. If the triggering attack misses you because of this bonus, the target of the attack changes from you to the attacker. The attacker rolls his attack again to determine if he hits himself.

Starless Void.name: Starless Void
Starless Void.flavor: A shadow from the wintry void between stars falls upon your foe, shrouding it with a layer of celestial frost that hinders its ability to defend itself.
Starless Void.onHit: 4d8 + Constitution modifier cold damage, and the target grants combat advantage to all your allies until the end of your next turn.
Starless Void.starPact: If this attack hits, the target takes a penalty to AC equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.

Gibbeth's Embrace.name: Gibbeth's Embrace
Gibbeth's Embrace.flavor: Pressed and desperate, a stray recollection of Gibbeth the Endless occurs to you. You hastily force the memory upon your foe, who is embraced in a clasp of palpable hate.
Gibbeth's Embrace.onHit: 5d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and ongoing 10 force damage (save ends).

Envoy of Nihal.name: Envoy of Nihal
Envoy of Nihal.flavor: You call beyond the boundaries of matter, space, and perhaps even sanity. Nihal answers by sending a humanoid-shaped hole in reality filled with writhing red worms, which fall upon your foe.
Envoy of Nihal.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier acid damage. If the target takes damage from this attack, you can spend a healing surge.
Envoy of Nihal.starPact: Add double your Charisma modifier to the hit points regained from the healing surge.

Caiphon's Abominable Melody.name: Caiphon's Abominable Melody
Caiphon's Abominable Melody.flavor: The atonal song of Caiphon, the Dream Whisperer, pierces the fabric between worlds. Your foe covers its ears, closes its eyes, and begins to shriek. Even so, notes of the horrible tune are still faintly audible above the screaming.
Caiphon's Abominable Melody.onHit: 6d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is deafened (save ends), blinded (save ends), and slowed (save ends a separate save is required to relieve each condition. At the beginning of the target’s turn, if it is still suffering from any one of the conditions you inflicted upon it, it takes another 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you can slide the target a number of spaces equal to your Charisma modifier. Until the end of the encounter, any time you take damage, roll a d20. If you roll 10 or higher, reduce the damage to 0.
Caiphon's Abominable Melody.special: Each round a target is still affected by this spell, the ally (or you) closest to the target hears an echo of abominable melody and takes 1d10 psychic damage.

Awaken the Dragon.name: Awaken the Dragon
Awaken the Dragon.flavor: You rouse the soul of a long-dead dragon, calling down its necrotic breath upon your foes.
Awaken the Dragon.onHit: 3d8 + Constitution modifier necrotic damage. If the target is cursed by you, it gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
Awaken the Dragon.vestigePact: You gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier.

Darkspiral Aura.name: Darkspiral Aura
Darkspiral Aura.flavor: As your cursed enemies fall in battle, your Darkspiral Aura grows in power. You can unleash it on an enemy, blasting its mind and body.
Darkspiral Aura.effect: When an enemy under your Warlock’s Curse is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, add 1 to your Darkspiral Aura. Your Darkspiral Aura has a starting value of 0, and it resets to 0 when you take a short rest or an extended rest.
Darkspiral Aura.trigger: When an enemy makes a melee attack or a ranged attack against you, you can use your Darkspiral Aura as an immediate interrupt.
Darkspiral Aura.onHit:
1d6 necrotic and psychic damage to that enemy for each point of your Darkspiral Aura’s current value
At 11th level, the damage you deal increases to 1d8 per point of your Darkspiral Aura’s current value, and at 21st level the damage increases to 1d10 per point of your Darkspiral Aura’s current value.
Darkspiral Aura.special: If this attack deals less than 12 damage, the value of your Darkspiral Aura becomes 0. If this attack deals 12 damage or more, you can cause the enemy to be weakened for its attack (which means the attack deals half damage), and the value of your Darkspiral Aura becomes 1.

Arms of Hadar.name: Arms of Hadar
Arms of Hadar.flavor: You call upon Hadar, the Ebon Hunger. Black tendrils erupt from your body and batter nearby creatures, pushing them from you.
Arms of Hadar.onHit: 1d8 + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Arms of Hadar.starPact: You push the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Life Bind.name: Life Bind
Life Bind.flavor: You call upon arcane power to wither your foe’s flesh and cut its connection to life.
Life Bind.onHit: 2d8 + Constitution modifier necrotic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot regain hit points, cannot gain temporary hit points, and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws.
Life Bind.vestigePact: The attack deals extra necrotic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Sprite War Call.name: Sprite War Call
Sprite War Call.flavor: An army of sprites flickers into existence, loosing a barrage of miniature arrows that stings your enemy and induces lethargy in it.
Sprite War Call.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is slowed and grants combat advantage to you.

Decree of Khirad.name: Decree of Khirad
Decree of Khirad.flavor: A pale blue flame appears above your brow as you utter a condemnation that makes foes mistake allies for enemies.
Decree of Khirad.effect: Before the attack, you slide the target 2 squares.
Decree of Khirad.onHit: The target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice. If the target misses with the attack, it takes 1d6 + your Charisma modifier psychic damage.

Caiphon's Leap.name: Caiphon's Leap
Caiphon's Leap.flavor: You call upon Caiphon the Dream Whisperer, and with his aid, you move out of harm’s way.
Caiphon's Leap.trigger: An enemy cursed by you hits you with a melee attack
Caiphon's Leap.effect: You reduce the damage you take by your Charisma modifier. You then teleport 2 squares.

Eyes of the Spider Queen.name: Eyes of the Spider Queen
Eyes of the Spider Queen.flavor: A cluster of dull black eyes appears on your forehead, giving you enhanced sight in darkness and the power to see the unseen.
Eyes of the Spider Queen.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain darkvision and can see invisible objects and creatures that are adjacent to you.

Fey Bargain.name: Fey Bargain
Fey Bargain.flavor: You gain good luck now in exchange for bad luck later.
Fey Bargain.effect: You gain a +2 bonus to your next attack roll, but automatically fail your next saving throw before the end of the encounter.

Delban's Deadly Attention.name: Delban's Deadly Attention
Delban's Deadly Attention.flavor: A bolt of frigid starlight shines down and bathes your foe, causing the creature to suffer a spasm of agony just as it attacks you.
Delban's Deadly Attention.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Delban's Deadly Attention.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Delban's Deadly Attention.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage. The target chooses either to deal half damage to you with its melee attack or to take 1d8 extra necrotic damage.
Delban's Deadly Attention.starPact: The attack deals 1d8 + your Intelligence modifier extra necrotic damage.

Pipes of Winter.name: Pipes of Winter
Pipes of Winter.flavor: With a gesture, a set of glacial pipes appears at your lips. Blowing on it, you produce a horrid keening that chills your foes to the bone.
Pipes of Winter.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Pipes of Winter.feyPact: Each enemy adjacent to the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Vestige's Calamity.name: Vestige's Calamity
Vestige's Calamity.flavor: With a single word, you submerge your enemy in a deluge of chaotic energy.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Vestige's Calamity.onHit: 2d8 + Constitution modifier damage. If the target is cursed by you, it takes extra cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Vestige's Calamity.vestigePact: If the target is cursed by you, the attack also deals the extra damage to each creature adjacent to the target.

Crackling Fire.name: Crackling Fire
Crackling Fire.flavor: An eldritch storm of fire and lightning erupts from you to scour your foes, leaving them vulnerable to future attacks.
Crackling Fire.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire and lightning damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 fire and vulnerable 5 lightning (save ends both).

Lure of Gibbeth.name: Lure of Gibbeth
Lure of Gibbeth.flavor: A fleeting thought of Gibbeth the Endless, an unknowable entity slain at the birth of the world but poised to return at the world’s ending, seizes your enemy’s mind and draws your foe toward you like a moth to flame.
Lure of Gibbeth.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target 4 squares.
Lure of Gibbeth.onMiss: Half damage, and you pull the target 2 squares.
Lure of Gibbeth.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can pull the target 2 squares as a minor action once during your turn.

Venomous Webs.name: Venomous Webs
Venomous Webs.flavor: Sticky webs slick with acid burn your foe, poisoning its flesh with each step it takes.
Venomous Webs.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies (save ends).
Venomous Webs.effect: If the target willingly moves before the end of its next turn, it takes ongoing poison damage equal to your Intelligence modifier (save ends).

Racing Fire of Ulban.name: Racing Fire of Ulban
Racing Fire of Ulban.flavor: You move with the swiftness of Ulban, whose burning glory sometimes flashes across the sky in a fiery streak of blue and white.

Acrid Decay.name: Acrid Decay
Acrid Decay.flavor: You extend your hand, and two sickly green bolts spiral out from your fingers, burning and devouring your enemy.
Acrid Decay.onHit: 1d12 + Constitution modifier acid and necrotic damage.
Acrid Decay.vestigePact: The target also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Transcendent Dance.name: Transcendent Dance
Transcendent Dance.flavor: For a moment, your mind and body are in harmony, and you achieve the pinnacle of grace and speed.
Transcendent Dance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a bonus to speed and saving throws equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1).

Killing Flames.name: Killing Flames
Killing Flames.flavor: You use an enemy’s recent injury to fuel infernal flames and sear the foe.
Killing Flames.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you becomes bloodied
Killing Flames.infernalPact: The damage ignores resistance to fire.

Skirmisher's Volley.name: Skirmisher's Volley
Skirmisher's Volley.flavor: You fire arcane bolts at your enemies before moving away.
Skirmisher's Volley.effect: After the attack is resolved, you shift 1 square.
Skirmisher's Volley.vestigePact: You shift a number of squares equal to 1 + the number of targets you hit with the attack.

Wraith's Shadow.name: Wraith's Shadow
Wraith's Shadow.flavor: The shadows congeal and smother your foe in a sickly mass of debilitating darkness.
Wraith's Shadow.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Wraith's Shadow.darkPact: You can choose to deal no damage with this attack and instead make the target immobilized and weakened until the end of your next turn.

Dark Rain of Mutuz-Vot.name: Dark Rain of Mutuz-Vot
Dark Rain of Mutuz-Vot.flavor: You bring forth storm clouds that exude droplets of liquid darkness, just like the rains of the massive cavern of Mutuz-Vot in the Underdark.
Dark Rain of Mutuz-Vot.effect: The burst creates a zone of raining darkness that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone’s area is lightly obscured. Each creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there is blinded (save ends).

Devouring Death.name: Devouring Death
Devouring Death.flavor: A bolt of black vitriol splashes over your foe, leaving it vulnerable to further acid attacks and to your magic of death and decay.
Devouring Death.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier acid damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target gains vulnerable 10 acid and vulnerable 10 necrotic.
Devouring Death.darkPact: The target loses any resistance to acid or resistance to necrotic until the end of your next turn.

Life Force Reclaimed.name: Life Force Reclaimed
Life Force Reclaimed.flavor: Your bolt of arcane energy draws vitality from your foe.
Life Force Reclaimed.onHit: 3d8 + Constitution modifier damage. You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value.
Life Force Reclaimed.vestigePact: The number of temporary hit points you gain equals your healing surge value + twice your Intelligence modifier.

Void Star.name: Void Star
Void Star.flavor: You summon a fragment of a dark star and hurl it at your foe, causing the creature’s flesh to slough away.
Void Star.onHit: 4d8 + Constitution modifier necrotic damage. The target takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage, and whenever the target would regain hit points, you regain the hit points instead (save ends both).
Void Star.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends).

Wakeman's Invocation.name: Wakeman's Invocation
Wakeman's Invocation.flavor: You employ a defensive technique developed by the scholar Strom Wakeman, who learned to use the power of Far Realm creatures without risking one’s sanity.
Wakeman's Invocation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against ranged attacks, and whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, you can teleport that creature 2 squares as an immediate interrupt.

Wall of Inky Night.name: Wall of Inky Night
Wall of Inky Night.flavor: You pull an oily blackness out of the ether to consume your enemies in darkness.
Wall of Inky Night.effect: You conjure a wall of rippling blackness that lasts until the end of the encounter. The wall is 2 squares high and blocks line of sight. Any creature is blinded while within the wall. As a standard action, you can move the wall 10 squares.

Arrow of Arcane Light.name: Arrow of Arcane Light
Arrow of Arcane Light.flavor: Drawing a bow made of radiant energy, you become like one of King Elidyr’s elite archers.
Arrow of Arcane Light.attack: Constitution vs. Reflex. This attack ignores all cover and concealment, and the attack can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.
Arrow of Arcane Light.vestigePact: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Infernal Chains.name: Infernal Chains
Infernal Chains.flavor: Flames dance along the red-hot chains that you summon to enwrap your opponent.
Infernal Chains.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Instruction in Darkness.name: Instruction in Darkness
Instruction in Darkness.flavor: You lower a black veil over your foe and show the creature what darkness truly means.
Instruction in Darkness.onHit: The secondary target is blinded (save ends).
Instruction in Darkness.onMiss: The primary target is blinded (save ends).
Instruction in Darkness.requirement: The Instruction in Darkness power must be active to use this power.

The Prince's Horde.name: The Prince's Horde
The Prince's Horde.flavor: Thousands of tiny, insectlike warriors assault and confuse your enemy.
The Prince's Horde.effect: The target is assaulted by a cloud of fairy warriors (save ends). While the target is affected by the cloud, the target treats all creatures as having concealment. At the start of the target’s turn, the target and each creature adjacent to the target take 1d10 + your Charisma modifier damage.

Manipulating Thunderbolt.name: Manipulating Thunderbolt
Manipulating Thunderbolt.flavor: With a clap of your hands, your enemy is struck by a clawlike thunderbolt, which picks up the creature and flings it aside.
Manipulating Thunderbolt.onHit: 3d8 + Constitution modifier lightning and thunder damage. You slide the target 1 square, and it is immobilized until the end of its next turn.
Manipulating Thunderbolt.infernalPact: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Shattering of the Sword.name: Shattering of the Sword
Shattering of the Sword.flavor: You invoke the shattering of King Elidyr’s sword—broken in the last moments of his life—and make your foes feel the king’s shock.
Shattering of the Sword.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Shattering of the Sword.vestigePact: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Soul of the Treant.name: Soul of the Treant
Soul of the Treant.flavor: You awaken the spirit of a long-dead treant, which possesses your enemy’s body and makes the creature lash out against its allies.
Soul of the Treant.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Each enemy adjacent to the target takes 1d8 + your Charisma modifier damage. You push each enemy adjacent to the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier and knock it prone.
Soul of the Treant.feyPact: You also knock the target prone.

Zutwa's Incandescence.name: Zutwa's Incandescence
Zutwa's Incandescence.flavor: You shine with the light of Zutwa’s life force, which overwhelms your foes’ vision.
Zutwa's Incandescence.onHit:
2d8 + Constitution modifier radiant damage, and the
target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Zutwa's Incandescence.vestigePact: The target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Arrangement of Disorder.name: Arrangement of Disorder
Arrangement of Disorder.flavor: Like the still point in a storm, you stand at the center of a burst of astral power that tears your enemies through space while arranging your allies to occupy the most advantageous positions.
Arrangement of Disorder.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and you teleport the target to another space within the burst.
Arrangement of Disorder.effect: You teleport each ally within the burst to another space within the burst.

Eyes of the Victim.name: Eyes of the Victim
Eyes of the Victim.flavor: From magic, you craft an ancient contagion to eat away your foes’ sight.
Eyes of the Victim.effect: The target gains blindness contagion (save ends). While a creature is affected by blindness contagion, that creature is blinded, and each enemy that starts its turn adjacent to that creature gains blindness contagion (save ends).

Forbiddance of the Ninth.name: Forbiddance of the Ninth
Forbiddance of the Ninth.flavor: A wall of black flame rises from the floor at your behest. It protects you while unleashing gouts of fire on foes.
Forbiddance of the Ninth.effect:
You conjure a wall of flame that is up to 3 squares high and lasts until the end of the encounter. The wall blocks line of sight.
Entering a wall square costs 3 extra squares of movement. Each creature that starts its turn within the wall’s space takes 2d10 + your Constitution modifier fire damage, and any creature other than you that starts its turn adjacent to the wall takes 1d10 + your Constitution modifier fire damage.
As a move action, you can move the wall to a space adjacent to you. Once per round, you can use the Forbiddance of the Ninth Attack power, which must include at least 2 wall squares in the blast.
Forbiddance of the Ninth.requirement: The Forbiddance of the Ninth power must be active to use this power.

Eyes of the Vestige.name: Eyes of the Vestige
Eyes of the Vestige.flavor: Your enemy’s eyes glow with an eldritch light as your vestige takes hold and scours that foe’s mind while you curse another nearby foe.
Eyes of the Vestige.onHit:
1d6 + Constitution modifier psychic damage. Choose the target or a creature within 3 squares of the target and within the target’s line of sight. You place your Warlock’s Curse on that creature; if the creature is already cursed by you, you can deal your Warlock’s Curse extra damage to that creature instead of to the target.
Level 21: 2d6 + Constitution modifier psychic damage.
Eyes of the Vestige.augment(KingElidyr): One ally who hits the target before the end of your next turn can roll a saving throw.
Eyes of the Vestige.augment(Zutwa): You gain your Prime Shot bonus against the target until the end of your next turn.
Eyes of the Vestige.augment(otherVestige): See the “Eyes of the Vestige Augment” entry for the daily power that grants access to the vestige.

Vestige of Khaeleth.name: Vestige of Khaeleth
Vestige of Khaeleth.flavor: Khaeleth was a divine entity that gave of himself until only a shred remained. Invoking him, you perform a similar act on behalf of an ally.
Vestige of Khaeleth.onHit: 1d8 + Constitution modifier damage. You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier for each ally adjacent to you.
Vestige of Khaeleth.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Khaeleth.
Vestige of Khaeleth.khaelethPactBoon: An ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Vestige of Khaeleth.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: The first time your eyes of the vestige target deals damage to an ally before the end of your next turn, you can reduce that damage by any amount and take damage equal to the amount of the reduction. The damage has no type.

Vestige of Mount Vaelis.name: Vestige of Mount Vaelis
Vestige of Mount Vaelis.flavor: You tell of the victory of the primordials against the divine army at Mount Vaelis, conjuring the thunderous echoes of their success.
Vestige of Mount Vaelis.onHit: 2d8 + Constitution modifier thunder damage, and the target cannot walk or run (save ends).
Vestige of Mount Vaelis.onMiss: Half damage, and the target cannot walk or run until the end of your next turn.
Vestige of Mount Vaelis.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Mount Vaelis.
Vestige of Mount Vaelis.mountVaelisPactBoon: One creature cursed by you and within 5 squares of you gains vulnerable 5 thunder until the end of your next turn.
Vestige of Mount Vaelis.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige attack deals 1d6 extra thunder damage.

Vestige of Ugar.name: Vestige of Ugar
Vestige of Ugar.flavor: Upon his demise, Ugar the Unforgiving dissolved into sand and became a harsh desert. Your words of power bring forth the searing flame of that land to burn your foes.
Vestige of Ugar.effect: The burst creates a zone of burning light that lasts until the end of the encounter. Each creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 1d10 fire damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. Creatures cannot benefit from concealment while within the zone.
Vestige of Ugar.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Ugar the Unforgiving.
Vestige of Ugar.ugarPactBoon: You can move the zone 3 squares as a free action.
Vestige of Ugar.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige attack deals fire damage instead of psychic damage. The target loses concealment and cannot regain it until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of Xandor.name: Vestige of Xandor
Vestige of Xandor.flavor: To know the borders of sanity, one has to cross them. With the aid of Xandor the Mad, you push your foe across that threshold.
Vestige of Xandor.onHit: 2d6 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is influenced by the vestige of Xandor (save ends). While it is influenced, at the start of each of its turns, it must choose either to be dazed until the start of its next turn or to take psychic damage equal to twice your Constitution modifier.
Vestige of Xandor.onMiss: 2d6 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Vestige of Xandor.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Xandor the Mad.
Vestige of Xandor.xandorPactBoon: You can roll a saving throw. If you have no effect on you that a save can end, you instead gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Vestige of Xandor.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige attack deals 1d8 extra psychic damage.

Vestige of Ilmeth.name: Vestige of Ilmeth
Vestige of Ilmeth.flavor: The primordial Ilmeth felt sorrow for the lives he claimed in the Dawn War, and the war-frenzied titans under his command destroyed him for his weakness. You channel the sorrow of the slain primordial to wound your enemy with regret.
Vestige of Ilmeth.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier psychic damage. Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target makes an attack roll against you, it takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Vestige of Ilmeth.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Ilmeth.
Vestige of Ilmeth.ilmethPactBoon: You and an ally within 5 squares of you can swap positions as a free action.
Vestige of Ilmeth.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige target also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of Shax.name: Vestige of Shax
Vestige of Shax.flavor: Shax the Devastator is a dead primordial of the sea. With a wave of your hand, you summon a fragment of his power.
Vestige of Shax.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to  your Intelligence modifier.
Vestige of Shax.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Shax the Devastator
Vestige of Shax.shaxPactBoon: You can end one dazed, stunned, immobilized, or restrained condition on you or on an ally within 5 squares of you.
Vestige of Shax.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: You push your eyes of the vestige target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Vestige of Leraje.name: Vestige of Leraje
Vestige of Leraje.flavor: Leraje gave up the lush woods to prove her mastery of the bow, and was cast away for it. You borrow her skill, but not her pride.
Vestige of Leraje.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
Vestige of Leraje.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Leraje.
Vestige of Leraje.lerajePactBoon: Living plants temporarily grow around you. Until the end of your next turn, you have cover against attackers that are not adjacent to you.
Vestige of Leraje.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige target is also immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of Solis.name: Vestige of Solis
Vestige of Solis.flavor: A falling star soars downward, burning bright as it strikes your foe in a deafening explosion.
Vestige of Solis.target: Each creature in the burst centered on the primary target of the Vestige of Solis attack.
Vestige of Solis.onHit: The target is dazed and deafened (save ends both).
Vestige of Solis.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Solis.
Vestige of Solis.solisPactBoon: Each enemy within 3 squares of you is deafened and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Vestige of Solis.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: If your eyes of the vestige target makes an attack roll against any of your allies before the end of the target’s next turn, the target takes fire and thunder damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Vestige of Solis.requirement: Primary target of the Vestige of Solis power has been hit.

Despair of Zhudun.name: Despair of Zhudun
Despair of Zhudun.flavor: You manifest an aspect of the blank face of dead Zhudun, causing your foe to collapse in fear.
Despair of Zhudun.onHit: 1d8 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and you knock the target prone. If the target stands up during its next turn, it takes 2d8 psychic damage and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Despair of Zhudun.starPact: If the target stands up during its next turn, it also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Sea Tyrant's Fury.name: Sea Tyrant's Fury
Sea Tyrant's Fury.flavor: Arcane waves sweep your foes to the ground as you harness the rage of the ancient Sea Tyrant.
Sea Tyrant's Fury.onHit: 2d8 + Constitution modifier damage, and you knock the target prone and push it a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Sea Tyrant's Fury.vestigePact: You and any allies within 5 squares of you gain a +2 power bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of Amaan.name: Vestige of Amaan
Vestige of Amaan.flavor: Your magic recalls Kaestelaria’s enslavement by the dead god Amaan, imposing similar shackles upon your foe.
Vestige of Amaan.onHit: 3d8 + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and gains vulnerable 10 to all damage (save ends both).
Vestige of Amaan.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Vestige of Amaan.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Amaan.
Vestige of Amaan.amaanPactBoon: You can push or pull a creature cursed by you and within 10 squares of you a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Vestige of Amaan.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: You push or pull your eyes of the vestige target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Vestige of the Burned Emperors.name: Vestige of the Burned Emperors
Vestige of the Burned Emperors.flavor: The Burned Emperors ruled a region torn by strife. Once defeated, they became a shadowy entity, which you now call upon.
Vestige of the Burned Emperors.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier damage. You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier for each ally adjacent to the target.
Vestige of the Burned Emperors.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of the Burned Emperors.
Vestige of the Burned Emperors.burnedEmperorPactBoon: You can teleport an ally within 5 squares of you 3 squares.
Vestige of the Burned Emperors.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Each ally adjacent to your eyes of the vestige target can shift 1 square as a free action.

Maddening Whispers.name: Maddening Whispers
Maddening Whispers.flavor: Your foe clasps its hands over its ears, shrieking in panic as it is overcome by terror.
Maddening Whispers.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn. At the start of the target’s next turn, you slide the target 2 squares.
Maddening Whispers.starPact: At the start of the target’s next turn, you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Swarm of Fangs.name: Swarm of Fangs
Swarm of Fangs.flavor: High-pitched, shrieking laughter echoes around your foe as a horde of tiny, needle-toothed, winged fey descends upon it.
Swarm of Fangs.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Swarm of Fangs.feyPact: All enemies within 2 squares of the target take 10 + your Intelligence modifier damage.

Vestige of Land's Soul.name: Vestige of Land's Soul
Vestige of Land's Soul.flavor: Your call causes the earth to rise up and crush your foe while bestowing life on you.
Vestige of Land's Soul.onHit: 5d8 + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). While the target is slowed by this power, you gain regeneration 10.
Vestige of Land's Soul.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Land’s Soul.
Vestige of Land's Soul.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Until the end of your next turn, your eyes of the vestige target gains vulnerable 5 + your Intelligence modifier to acid, fire, lightning, or thunder (your choice).

Vestige of the Queen of Namhar.name: Vestige of the Queen of Namhar
Vestige of the Queen of Namhar.flavor: You call upon the Queen of Namhar, who died of thirst in the Namharid Desert, to send your foe a vivid image of death by thirst.
Vestige of the Queen of Namhar.onHit: 4d10 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).
Vestige of the Queen of Namhar.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 psychic damage (save ends). The target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Vestige of the Queen of Namhar.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of the Queen of Namhar.
Vestige of the Queen of Namhar.queenOfNamhar: The nearest creature cursed by you is dazed (save ends).
Vestige of the Queen of Namhar.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige target is weakened until the end of its next turn.

Vestige of the Master of the Hidden Flam.name: Vestige of the Master of the Hidden Flame
Vestige of the Master of the Hidden Flam.flavor: You call on the vestige of the spellcaster called the Master of the Hidden Flame. Through him, you burn foes by force of will.
Vestige of the Master of the Hidden Flam.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of the Master of the Hidden Flame.
Vestige of the Master of the Hidden Flam.masterOfTheHiddenFlamePactBoon: Each enemy cursed by you and within 5 squares of you takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Vestige of the Master of the Hidden Flam.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Vestige of Zuriel.name: Vestige of Zuriel
Vestige of Zuriel.flavor: As you attack, you scream a war cry to Zuriel, a forgotten deity dedicated to wars of justice.
Vestige of Zuriel.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Zuriel.
Vestige of Zuriel.zurielPactBoon: You gain a bonus to your next damage roll before the end of your next turn equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Vestige of Zuriel.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: You knock your eyes of the vestige target prone, and the attack deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Well of Death.name: Well of Death
Well of Death.flavor: You show your foes their doom, channeling dark power from your allies’ very souls.
Well of Death.effect: An ally within 5 squares of you can lose a healing surge to allow you to deal an additional 2d8 necrotic damage.

Consuming Ray.name: Consuming Ray
Consuming Ray.flavor: You barter with your pact holder for temporary power, consuming your own life force for a powerful attack
Consuming Ray.effect: You can choose to lose a healing surge. If you do so, the target takes ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends).

Accursed Souls.name: Accursed Souls
Accursed Souls.flavor: The souls of those who fall while bearing your curse explode from their bodies to slay more of your foes.
Accursed Souls.trigger: An enemy you have cursed is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer.
Accursed Souls.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy you have cursed is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, enemies adjacent to that target take 10 necrotic damage.

Hellfire Soul.name: Hellfire Soul
Hellfire Soul.flavor: Drawing upon your infernal ties, you set a foe’s soul afire.
Hellfire Soul.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic and fire damage.
Hellfire Soul.effect: If this attack would reduce the target to 0 hit points or fewer, you instead reduce the target to 1 hit point and the target is dominated by you until the end of the encounter.

Eldritch Strike.name: Eldritch Strike
Eldritch Strike.flavor: The dire power of your attack drives your enemy before you.
Eldritch Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma or Constitution modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Charisma or Constitution modifier at 21st level.
Eldritch Strike.special:
When you take this power, you determine whether you use Charisma or Constitution for the power’s attack roll and damage roll. This choice remains throughout the character’s life.
This power counts as a melee basic attack. You can choose this power instead of eldritch blast as the power associated with your Eldritch Blast class feature.

Ethereal Sidestep.name: Ethereal Sidestep
Ethereal Sidestep.flavor: You slip through a rift in reality and appear a few feet away.

Star Shackles.name: Star Shackles
Star Shackles.flavor: Invisible force lifts your foes from the ground and squeezes the life from them.
Star Shackles.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is grabbed. If the target attempts to escape, use your Fortitude or Reflex.
Star Shackles.sustainStandard: Those this power still has grabbed take 1d6 + Charisma modifier damage when you sustain this power. After you sustain this power, you can use a minor action to use this power’s attack on one target the power doesn’t have grabbed within 2 squares of a target the power does have grabbed.

Lash of the Long Night.name: Lash of the Long Night
Lash of the Long Night.flavor: You lash out with a frigid wind to hold your foe at bay.
Lash of the Long Night.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Lash of the Long Night.feyPact: The target is pushed a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

Ooze Incarnate.name: Ooze Incarnate
Ooze Incarnate.flavor: Your body and items turn to caustic jelly as you slide through a throng of foes.
Ooze Incarnate.effect: You shift your speed, including through squares occupied by enemies. Until the end of your next turn, you can squeeze without penalties to your attack rolls or speed.
Ooze Incarnate.targets: Creatures whose spaces you shift through
Ooze Incarnate.onHit: 3d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Dread Briars.name: Dread Briars
Dread Briars.flavor: Oily black vines bristling with thorns erupt around your foe and swiftly shroud it in life-draining tangles.
Dread Briars.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and ongoing 10 necrotic damage and the target is immobilized (save ends both).
Dread Briars.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Charm of Hearts.name: Charm of Hearts
Charm of Hearts.flavor: Your enemies might not love you, but thanks to this charm crafted by the Prince of Hearts, they do not attack you when you give them the opportunity.
Charm of Hearts.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you do not provoke opportunity attacks and you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses.

Fate's Frayed Thread.name: Fate's Frayed Thread
Fate's Frayed Thread.flavor: With one miss, the fates collude against your enemy, heralding its ultimate doom.
Fate's Frayed Thread.trigger: An enemy misses you with an attack
Fate's Frayed Thread.effect: You place your Warlock’s Curse on the target. Also, until the end of your next turn, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls against you and grants combat advantage to you.

The Lash's Bite.name: The Lash's Bite
The Lash's Bite.flavor: By focusing your will, you rip vital energy from your enemy and cause it to ache deeply at the resulting loss.
The Lash's Bite.onHit: 3d10 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target loses all immunities and resistances (save ends).
The Lash's Bite.infernalPact: The target takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw against this effect.
The Lash's Bite.onMiss: By choosing to take psychic damage equal to 5 + onehalf your level, you do not expend this power and you gain a +4 power bonus to the attack roll with this power against the same target before the end of your next turn. You cannot reduce the damage you take in any way.

Vile Brand.name: Vile Brand
Vile Brand.flavor: With only a word, you cause a distant enemy’s hide to blacken and form a brand that decreases your foe’s ability to strike against you.
Vile Brand.onHit: 3d10 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target and any enemy adjacent to the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Vile Brand.infernalPact: Any enemy within 2 squares of you also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Vile Brand.onMiss: By choosing to take psychic damage equal to 5 + one-half your level, you do not expend this power and you gain a +4 power bonus to the attack roll with this power against the same target before the end of your next turn. You cannot reduce the damage you take in any way.

Ruinous Phrase.name: Ruinous Phrase
Ruinous Phrase.flavor: The words that leave your lips resonate within an object, causing it to shatter.
Ruinous Phrase.target: One unattended medium or smaller non-magical, inanimate object in the burst
Ruinous Phrase.effect: If the target has hit points equal to 20 + your level or fewer, you destroy it. Otherwise, you deal it no damage and do not expend this power.
Ruinous Phrase.infernalPact: The target is destroyed if it has hit points equal to 25 + your level or fewer, instead of 20.

Blistering Torrent.name: Blistering Torrent
Blistering Torrent.flavor: As you utter blistering words, your foes feel a dull pain that crescendos into a sharp pain and leaves them unable to hear for a time.
Blistering Torrent.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier necrotic damage, and the target is deafened until the end of the encounter.
Blistering Torrent.infernalPact: The target is also slowed (save ends).

Hellsworn Blessing.name: Hellsworn Blessing
Hellsworn Blessing.flavor: The words you whisper in an ally’s ear transform your companion into a more useful servant.
Hellsworn Blessing.effect: The target assumes the form of a hellsworn until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss the effect as a minor action. While in this form, the target gains darkvision, gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls, and deals 2d8 extra fire damage with melee attacks.
Hellsworn Blessing.infernalPact: The target also gains resist fire equal to 5 + one-half your level.

Unspeakable Bond.name: Unspeakable Bond
Unspeakable Bond.flavor: The injury you sustain vanishes and reappears on a nearby ally, and with it comes a cold anger that makes your ally a more dangerous combatant.
Unspeakable Bond.trigger: You are damaged by an attack
Unspeakable Bond.effect: The target takes the damage from the triggering attack instead of you. You still take any other effects from the attack. The target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +5 power bonus to damage rolls until the end of your next turn.
Unspeakable Bond.infernalPact: The target also gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Infectious Curse.name: Infectious Curse
Infectious Curse.flavor: A hideous glyph burns into your enemy’s brow and a vile darkness spreads the curse your enemy now carries to its allies.
Infectious Curse.onHit: 2d12 + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the target gains your Warlock’s Curse.
Infectious Curse.infernalPact: You can also slide the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Infectious Curse.onMiss: By choosing to take psychic damage equal to 5 + one-half your level, you do not expend this power and you gain a +4 power bonus to the attack roll with this power against the same target before the end of your next turn. You cannot reduce the damage you take in any way.

Brimstone Caress.name: Brimstone Caress
Brimstone Caress.flavor: With a single swift word, you cause an ally to erupt in hellish flames and reappear.
Brimstone Caress.effect: The target takes fire damage equal to half your level and teleports 5 squares.
Brimstone Caress.infernalPact: The target gains concealment until the start of your next turn.

Blasphemous Utterance.name: Blasphemous Utterance
Blasphemous Utterance.flavor: The terrible words you speak toll within the minds of those you wish to harm and cause them to lose some battle proficiency.
Blasphemous Utterance.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and defenses (save ends).
Blasphemous Utterance.infernalPact: The target also takes vulnerable 5 psychic damage (save ends).

Evil Expulsion.name: Evil Expulsion
Evil Expulsion.flavor: You pronounce your enemy’s doom and filthy black tendrils erupt to curse another in your enemy’s presence.
Evil Expulsion.onHit: 4d10 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target falls prone. You can place your Warlock’s Curse on any enemy adjacent to the target.
Evil Expulsion.infernalPact: You can instead place your Warlock’s Curse on any enemy within 3 squares of the target.
Evil Expulsion.onMiss: By choosing to take psychic damage equal to 5 + one-halfyour level, you do not expend this  power and you gain a +4 power bonus to the attack roll with this power against the same target before the end of your next turn. You cannot reduce the damage you take in any way.

Vile Resonance.name: Vile Resonance
Vile Resonance.flavor: The words you speak resonant in the area, causing both you and those you have cursed feel wounds more deeply.
Vile Resonance.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain vulnerable 5 to all damage, but your Warlock’s Curse deals 2d6 extra damage. You can end this stance as a minor action.
Vile Resonance.infernalPact: Until the stance ends, you also slide any enemy you hit with an attack 1 square.

Hellfire Eruption.name: Hellfire Eruption
Hellfire Eruption.flavor: Your foe erupts in hellish black flames that boil and writhe, incinerating anyone that comes too close.
Hellfire Eruption.onHit: 4d8 + Constitution modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends). While the target has this ongoing fire damage, any creature that starts its turn in a square adjacent to the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Hellfire Eruption.infernalPact: The target also takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls while it has ongoing damage from this power.
Hellfire Eruption.onMiss: By choosing to take psychic damage equal to 5 + one-half your level, you do not expend this power and you gain a +4 power bonus to the attack roll with this power against the same target before the end of your next turn. You cannot reduce the damage you take in any way.

Vestige of Thaxter.name: Vestige of Thaxter
Vestige of Thaxter.flavor: Thaxter, the great goblin hero, instills within you and your allies the cunning of a legendary goblin strike force.
Vestige of Thaxter.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier before or after this attack.
Vestige of Thaxter.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Thaxter.
Vestige of Thaxter.thaxterPactBoon: One ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next attack roll before the end of your next turn.
Vestige of Thaxter.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Until the end of your next turn, whenever your eyes of the vestige target misses you or an ally with an attack, the character it misses can shift 1 square as a free action.

Vestige of Baatar.name: Vestige of Baatar
Vestige of Baatar.flavor: You call upon Baatar the Tiderider, a powerful water archon, to drown your foe in elemental water.
Vestige of Baatar.onHit: 2d6 + Constitution modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Vestige of Baatar.onMiss: Half damage and target is slowed (save ends).
Vestige of Baatar.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Baatar.
Vestige of Baatar.baatarPactBoon: One creature affected by your Warlock’s Curse cannot charge or shift until the end of your next turn.
Vestige of Baatar.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Until the end of your next turn, you can slide your eyes of the vestige target 1 square as a free action whenever an ally hits it.

Vestige of the Onyx Queen.name: Vestige of the Onyx Queen
Vestige of the Onyx Queen.flavor: The Onyx Queen, a legendary black-scaled medusa who turned an army to stone before her defeat, grants you a measure of her power so that you can petrify your foes.
Vestige of the Onyx Queen.onHit: 2d8 + Constitution modifier poison damage, and you petrify the target (save ends).
Vestige of the Onyx Queen.onMiss: Half damage and you slow the target (save ends).
Vestige of the Onyx Queen.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of the Onyx Queen.
Vestige of the Onyx Queen.onyxQueenPactBoon: One creature within 5 squares of you takes a -2 penalty to Fortitude until the end of your next turn.
Vestige of the Onyx Queen.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige power deals 1d10 extra poison damage.

Vestige of the Unknown Arcanist.name: Vestige of the Unknown Arcanist
Vestige of the Unknown Arcanist.flavor: You release upon another the might of an unknown wizard who unleashed a spell that removed him, his name, and his enemies from the flow of time.
Vestige of the Unknown Arcanist.onHit: 2d6 + Constitution modifier damage, and the target vanishes (save ends). While vanished, the target takes 5 damage at the start of its turn, occupies no space, can take no actions, has neither line of sight nor line of effect to anything, and nothing has line of sight or line of effect to it. When the target saves, it reappears in its original space or the nearest unoccupied space.
Vestige of the Unknown Arcanist.onMiss: Half damage and you slow the target (save ends).
Vestige of the Unknown Arcanist.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of the Unknown Arcanist.
Vestige of the Unknown Arcanist.unknownArcanistPactBoon: You teleport one creature affected by your Warlock’s Curse 3 squares as a free action.
Vestige of the Unknown Arcanist.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of Kronata.name: Vestige of Kronata
Vestige of Kronata.flavor: With the fury of an ancient volcano god, you bring a rain of fire down on your enemy.
Vestige of Kronata.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier fire damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Vestige of Kronata.onMiss: Half damage and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Vestige of Kronata.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Kronata.
Vestige of Kronata.kronataPactBoon: As a free action, you deal fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier to one or two enemies affected by your Warlock’s Curse, and you push each enemy 1 square.
Vestige of Kronata.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: If your eyes of the vestige target moves closer to you before the end of your next turn, it takes 1d10 fire damage and falls prone at the end of its movement.

Vestige of Vykolad.name: Vestige of Vykolad
Vestige of Vykolad.flavor: One of the first vampires, Lord Vykolad faded away after countless lifetimes. You invoke his power to pull the life force from your enemies.
Vestige of Vykolad.onHit: 4d8 + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends). You regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge.
Vestige of Vykolad.onMiss: Half damage and you regain hit points equal to one-half your level + your Intelligence modifier.
Vestige of Vykolad.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Vykolad.
Vestige of Vykolad.vykoladPactBoon: You become insubstantial until the end of your next turn.
Vestige of Vykolad.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Your eyes of the vestige target takes a penalty to damage rolls equal to twice your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of the Earthen Maker.name: Vestige of the Earthen Maker
Vestige of the Earthen Maker.flavor: You invoke the forgotten maker of the terrifying tarrasque, borrowing some of the rage and strength that went into that creation.
Vestige of the Earthen Maker.effect: Damage and ongoing damage from this attack ignore all resistances and immunities.
Vestige of the Earthen Maker.onHit: 3d10 + Constitution modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Vestige of the Earthen Maker.onMiss: Half damage and the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Vestige of the Earthen Maker.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of the Earthen Maker.
Vestige of the Earthen Maker.earthenMakerPactBoon: You gain resist 10 to all damage until the end of your next turn. Each time you benefit from this boon again before the end of your next turn, increase the resistance by 5.
Vestige of the Earthen Maker.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: You push your eyes of the vestige target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier and knock the target prone, and the target cannot fly until the end of your next turn.

Gift to Avernus.name: Gift to Avernus
Gift to Avernus.flavor: You lash forth with a crackling ray of arcane power. As the beam rips into your foe’s flesh, you release part of your life force to ensure that this hellish bolt carries a portion of your foe’s with it.
Gift to Avernus.onMiss: You can choose to take damage equal to your level to reroll the attack roll. You can choose this only once each time you use this attack.

Grasp of the Iron Tower.name: Grasp of the Iron Tower
Grasp of the Iron Tower.flavor: A hand of iron appears around your foe and crushes it with the sickening sound of popping bones and grinding flesh.
Grasp of the Iron Tower.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the primary target cannot willingly move closer to you until the end of your next turn.
Grasp of the Iron Tower.infernalPact: You gain resist to all damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn.
Grasp of the Iron Tower.onMiss: You take damage equal to your level but can make a secondary attack.
Grasp of the Iron Tower.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Grasp of the Iron Tower.secondaryOnHit: One-half of 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the secondary target cannot move closer to you until the end of your next turn.

Lure of Minauros.name: Lure of Minauros
Lure of Minauros.flavor: You whisper dark promises on the wind, sending them forth to pollute your enemy’s mind with overwhelming terror that compels it to lash out in a panic.
Lure of Minauros.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the primary target takes a free action to make a melee basic attack against itself or an adjacent creature.
Lure of Minauros.infernalPact: Until the end of your next turn, whenever an enemy attacks you, each other enemy adjacent to you takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Lure of Minauros.onMiss: You take damage equal to your level but can make a secondary attack.
Lure of Minauros.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Lure of Minauros.secondaryOnHit: One-half of 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the secondary target takes a free action to make a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice (including itself ) that is adjacent to it; the secondary target’s attack deals half damage.

Pain to Pleasure.name: Pain to Pleasure
Pain to Pleasure.flavor: You unleash the dark magic of Belial, drawing strength and pleasure from your enemy’s tormented screams.
Pain to Pleasure.attack: Charisma vs. Reflex. Make two attack rolls. If either of them hits, resolve them as a single hit, and both of them must miss for the attack to miss.
Pain to Pleasure.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage if one attack roll hits, or 2d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage if two hit. If at least one attack roll hits, you regain hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Pain to Pleasure.infernalPact: You regain additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
Pain to Pleasure.onMiss: You regain additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
Pain to Pleasure.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Pain to Pleasure.secondaryAttack: Charisma vs. Reflex. Make two attack rolls. If either of them hits, resolve them as a single hit, and both of them must miss for the attack to miss.
Pain to Pleasure.secondaryOnHit: One-half of 1d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage if one attack roll hits, or 2d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage if two hit. If at least one attack roll hits, you regain hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Ice Blades of Levistus.name: Ice Blades of Levistus
Ice Blades of Levistus.flavor: You hurl a storm of ice shards at your foe while invoking the dark challenge of Levistus. The target must fight you, but like Levistus you do not believe in fighting on fair terms.
Ice Blades of Levistus.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage. In addition, you mark the target and immobilize it until the end of your next turn.
Ice Blades of Levistus.infernalPact: If the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target before the end of your next turn, it takes 2d10 + your Charisma modifier cold damage.
Ice Blades of Levistus.onMiss: You take damage equal to your level but can make a secondary attack.
Ice Blades of Levistus.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Ice Blades of Levistus.secondaryOnHit: One-half of 2d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage. In addition, you mark the target and slow it until the end of your next turn.

Dire Portents of Malbolge.name: Dire Portents of Malbolge
Dire Portents of Malbolge.flavor: Your foe shrieks in terror as, in its mind, horrid growths erupt across its body. It hacks away at them, heedless of the horrible injuries it inflicts upon itself.
Dire Portents of Malbolge.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the primary target is dazed until the start of its next turn.
Dire Portents of Malbolge.infernalPact: You can slide each enemy within 2 squares of the primary target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier to a square more than 2 squares from the primary target.
Dire Portents of Malbolge.onMiss: You take damage equal to your level but can make a secondary attack.
Dire Portents of Malbolge.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Dire Portents of Malbolge.secondaryOnHit: One-half of 3d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the secondary target is dazed until the start of its next turn.

Web of Lies.name: Web of Lies
Web of Lies.flavor: You weave a skein of lies worthy of Baalzebul around your enemy, turning friend to foe as it lashes out in a blind panic.
Web of Lies.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you create a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone fills the primary target’s space and all squares adjacent to it. The primary target cannot willingly leave the zone, and it can make attacks only against creatures within the zone.
Web of Lies.infernalPact: If the primary target does not attack during its next turn, it takes psychic damage equal to 15 + your Intelligence modifier.
Web of Lies.onMiss: You take damage equal to your level but can make a secondary attack.
Web of Lies.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Web of Lies.secondaryOnHit: One-half of 4d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you create a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone fills the secondary target’s space and all squares adjacent to it. The secondary target cannot leave the zone, and it can make attacks only against creatures within the zone.

Hellfire Fury.name: Hellfire Fury
Hellfire Fury.flavor: You unleash the fires of Mephistopheles. They will not be sated until they have charred your enemy’s flesh. Failing that, your ally’s flesh will do.
Hellfire Fury.infernalPact: You gain a power bonus to your next attack roll against the target equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Hellfire Fury.onMiss: You must repeat this attack against a different creature, gaining a cumulative +5 bonus to the damage roll each time you miss. You cannot target the same creature with this attack twice. You can choose to take damage equal to your level to cancel this miss effect.

Hand of Blight.name: Hand of Blight
Hand of Blight.flavor: A crackling black sphere gathers around your outspread hand. You can smite a nearby foe with it, or else fling it at a distant enemy.
Hand of Blight.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier necrotic and psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma or Constitution modifier necrotic and psychic damage.

Cruel Bounty.name: Cruel Bounty
Cruel Bounty.flavor: You create a blazing sigil that flares with unwholesome light, scouring your foe and promising an obscene blessing to any of your allies who bathe in its radiance.
Cruel Bounty.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against the target.

Ashen Scourge.name: Ashen Scourge
Ashen Scourge.flavor: You lash at your foe with a whip of fire, dragging it close. The whip leaves behind a residue of necrotic ash that withers your foe’s flesh.
Ashen Scourge.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier fire damage. The target grants combat advantage and takes ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends both).

Assassin's Bane.name: Assassin's Bane
Assassin's Bane.flavor: The ground blackens as coruscating energy swirls around you, hindering your foes’ movements and revealing any hidden enemies.
Assassin's Bane.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies within the zone cannot shift, teleport, or benefit from invisibility, concealment, or total concealment.

Sinister Extraction.name: Sinister Extraction
Sinister Extraction.flavor: Your enemy falters as you tear at its soul. One of your allies, seeing the foe’s defiance vanish, can use the opportunity to deliver an invigorating attack.
Sinister Extraction.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier psychic damage. The next one of your allies who hits the target with a melee attack before the end of your next turn gains temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Flames of the Smoking Crown.name: Flames of the Smoking Crown
Flames of the Smoking Crown.flavor: Hungry flames consume your enemy and send the creature into a panic that ignites your other foes.
Flames of the Smoking Crown.onHit: The target is affected by the flames of the smoking crown (save ends). Until the flames end, the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage. Also, whenever the target starts its turn you slide it a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier, and each enemy adjacent to the target after the slide takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Flames of the Smoking Crown.effect: 1d10 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier fire damage.

Sand Shape.name: Sand Shape
Sand Shape.flavor: You transform your body into sand, allowing you to resist attacks and pass through solid barriers.
Sand Shape.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you are insubstantial and can pass through any opening large enough to accommodate a single grain of sand. You cannot attack, pick up anything, or manipulate objects.

Sorcerer-King's Decree.name: Sorcerer-King's Decree
Sorcerer-King's Decree.flavor: Crackling lightning scorches your enemy with such ferocity that it sends nearby foes staggering back.
Sorcerer-King's Decree.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier lightning damage. You push the target and each enemy adjacent to the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Kalak's Burning Sands.name: Kalak's Burning Sands
Kalak's Burning Sands.flavor: You transform the ground beneath your foe’s feet into seething black sand. As your enemy sinks down, the sand scorches the creature.
Kalak's Burning Sands.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier fire damage, and you knock the target prone. The target cannot stand up and has cover against all creatures except you (save ends both).
Kalak's Burning Sands.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target takes ongoing 5 fire damage and is removed from play (save ends both). When the target saves, it reappears in the space it last occupied or in the nearest unoccupied space of its choice.
Kalak's Burning Sands.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

King's Step.name: King's Step
King's Step.flavor: After an enemy misses you with an attack, you take a form of sand and ash. You then zip across the battlefield and lay your curse upon the offending creature.
King's Step.trigger: An enemy misses you with an attack.
King's Step.effect: You fly your speed and are insubstantial during the move. After the move, you place your Warlock’s Curse on the triggering enemy.

Break the Will.name: Break the Will
Break the Will.flavor: Your magic breaks into your foe’s mind and leaves the creature reeling from the experience.
Break the Will.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Touch of the Two Moons.name: Touch of the Two Moons
Touch of the Two Moons.flavor: Invoking the name of Tectuktitlay, ruler of Draj the Two Moon City, you plunge your hand into a creature’s flesh and tear loose a piece of the creature’s spirit.
Touch of the Two Moons.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier damage.
Touch of the Two Moons.effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 5.
Touch of the Two Moons.secondaryOnHit: You push the secondary target a number of squares equal to its speed. The secondary target grants combat advantage (save ends).

Fail Me Not.name: Fail Me Not
Fail Me Not.flavor: Your magic infuses your allies’ attacks with power that comes at a dangerous cost.
Fail Me Not.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, your allies gain both a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier. The bonus applies to melee attacks and ranged attacks. Also, whenever one of your allies within the zone misses every target with a melee or a ranged attack, he or she gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the start of his or her next turn.

Obedience's Reward.name: Obedience's Reward
Obedience's Reward.flavor: At your command, an ally leaps forward to savage an enemy. However, that comrade suffers your ire if he or she wastes the opportunity you provide.
Obedience's Reward.effect: The target can use a free action either to make a melee basic attack or to charge, gaining a power bonus to the attack roll of either attack equal to your Intelligence modifier. If the target’s attack hits, it deals 2d8 extra damage. If it misses every target, the target takes damage equal to the higher of your Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier, and you regain the use of this power.

Voice of the Dictator.name: Voice of the Dictator
Voice of the Dictator.flavor: When you speak, the voice of Andropinis, sorcerer-king of Balic, joins your own, giving weight and power to your commands.
Voice of the Dictator.target: One creature that can hear you in the burst
Voice of the Dictator.eachFailedSavingThrow: The target takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier, and one ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier.
Voice of the Dictator.onMiss: 2d12 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier psychic damage.

Cerulean Shield.name: Cerulean Shield
Cerulean Shield.flavor: You throw up an arcane shield that catches a portion of an incoming attack and fashions it into a potent defense.
Cerulean Shield.trigger: You are hit by an attack that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder damage.
Cerulean Shield.effect: You gain resistance equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier to the triggering attack’s damage types until the end of your next turn. In addition, until the end of your next turn, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes damage of the triggering attack’s damage types. The damage equals the resistance you gained from this power.

Command of Execution.name: Command of Execution
Command of Execution.flavor: Your dire command staggers your foe and compels a couple of your allies to launch attacks against the creature.
Command of Execution.onHit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn. One or two of your allies within 5 squares of the target can use a free action either to make a melee basic attack against the target or to charge the target.

Word of the Sorcerer-King.name: Word of the Sorcerer-King
Word of the Sorcerer-King.flavor: With a single powerful word, you make your enemies feel the might of a sorcerer-king.
Word of the Sorcerer-King.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Word of the Sorcerer-King.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Price of Defiance.name: Price of Defiance
Price of Defiance.flavor: A ghostly hand enfolds your enemy, wrenching it toward waiting allies who dispatch it at your command.
Price of Defiance.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. You slide the target 5 squares to a square adjacent to one of your allies. That ally can then make a melee basic attack against the target as an opportunity action, gaining a power bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Dregoth's Ashen Curse.name: Dregoth's Ashen Curse
Dregoth's Ashen Curse.flavor: You ignite your enemy with black fire that corrupts the flesh and soul. As the flames gutter out, your foe’s body begins to turn to ash.
Dregoth's Ashen Curse.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier or Constitution modifier fire damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends both).
Dregoth's Ashen Curse.aftereffect: The target is slowed, is weakened, and takes ongoing 15 necrotic damage (save ends all).
Dregoth's Ashen Curse.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).

Confounding Laughter.name: Confounding Laughter
Confounding Laughter.flavor: You create haunting, maddening laughter about an enemy. The noise drives it mad with frustration, causing it to lash at anyone nearby.
Confounding Laughter.effect: You can slide the target up to 2 squares.
Confounding Laughter.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. The target then makes a melee basic attack as a free action against an enemy you choose. If this attack misses, the target takes 1d6 extra psychic damage.

Eldritch Bolt.name: Eldritch Bolt
Eldritch Bolt.flavor: With a gesture, you create a shard of shimmering force and send it streaking toward your enemy.
Eldritch Bolt.onHit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier force damage.
Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier force damage.
Eldritch Bolt.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Armor of Winter's Grasp.name: Armor of Winter's Grasp
Armor of Winter's Grasp.flavor: You create a vicious, icy wind that scythes through your enemies before settling on you as a shell of frozen air.
Armor of Winter's Grasp.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Armor of Winter's Grasp.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Fortitude until the end of the encounter.

Hellfire Blast.name: Hellfire Blast
Hellfire Blast.flavor: Waves of flame roll forth from your extended hand, blasting your foes.

Mists of Madness.name: Mists of Madness
Mists of Madness.flavor: A thick mist rises around you. Within it, the intoxicating power of fey magic overwhelms your enemies’ senses, driving those foes to lash out at each other in their madness.
Mists of Madness.onHit: 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice.
Mists of Madness.effect: If you miss every target, the power is not expended.

Spectral Fade.name: Spectral Fade
Spectral Fade.sourceRef: Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, Heroes of Shadow
Spectral Fade.flavor: You become misty and transparent, fading from your enemies’ view for a moment.
Spectral Fade.effect: You become invisible until the end of your turn.

Wrathful Aspect.name: Wrathful Aspect
Wrathful Aspect.flavor: Your eyes glow with power, and a cloak of red fire swirls around you as you channel the wrath and fury of your pact.
Wrathful Aspect.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 power bonus to Intimidate checks, and any creature that hits you with a melee attack takes 5 fire damage.

Lesser Planar Ally.name: Lesser Planar Ally
Lesser Planar Ally.flavor: The air around you ripples and becomes heavy as you call forth a spirit of the planes to serve you.
Lesser Planar Ally.effect:
You conjure the Tiny spirit of a planar being in a square adjacent to you. The spirit is an invisible conjuration that lasts until it is dismissed as a free action or until it completes its task, which can take no longer than 1 hour. You command the spirit to attempt one of the following tasks.
* Locate an Object or a Person: The spirit can locate a specific object or creature within 5 miles of you that you have seen or touched. When it completes the task, the spirit returns to you and describes the direction, distance, and location of the object or creature.
* Explore an Area: The spirit can provide a rough description of an area up to 20 squares on a side, including obvious physical features. The spirit cannot open doors or breach physical or magical barriers, so it cannot explore any area that a Tiny creature couldn’t reach. It cannot notice anything that requires a Perception check to detect. When it completes the task, the spirit returns to you and telepathically provides a mental image of the area.

Emerald Shield.name: Emerald Shield
Emerald Shield.flavor: Your magic brings forth a shield that is a mixture of green quartz and scintillating energy.
Emerald Shield.effect: The target takes 5 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Emerald Shield.requirement: The power Emerald Shield must be active in order to use this power.

Nightshade Dreams.name: Nightshade Dreams
Nightshade Dreams.flavor: Your hand turns black as you reach forward to deliver a dose of nightshade poison to your foe.
Nightshade Dreams.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier poison damage, and the target is dazed and takes ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends both).
Nightshade Dreams.onMiss: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage and takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends both).

Roaring Storm of Cania.name: Roaring Storm of Cania
Roaring Storm of Cania.flavor: A gale of frigid wind rips through your foes, hurling them to the ground and pelting them with razor-sharp blades of ice.
Roaring Storm of Cania.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target falls prone.
Roaring Storm of Cania.effect: You slide each target up to 3 squares.

Astral Eyes.name: Astral Eyes
Astral Eyes.flavor: Your eyes exude the light that bathes the Astral Sea, sharpening your sight and allowing you to perceive subtle details with ease.
Astral Eyes.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain darkvision and a +2 power bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks.

Iron Aspect of Dispater.name: Iron Aspect of Dispater
Iron Aspect of Dispater.flavor: Your skin becomes as hard as iron, making you immovable against your foes’ attacks.
Iron Aspect of Dispater.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain resist 5 to all damage and can ignore forced movement.

Summon Warlock's Ally.name: Summon Warlock's Ally
Summon Warlock's Ally.flavor: A sudden gust of wind, the smell of brimstone, and a flash of light herald the arrival of a creature from the planes, pulled into your presence to serve you.
Summon Warlock's Ally.effect:
You summon a creature associated with your pact in an unoccupied space within range. The creature is an ally to you and your allies.
The creature lacks actions of its own. Instead, you spend actions to command it mentally, choosing from the actions in the creature’s description. You must have line of effect to the creature to command it. When you command the creature, you and the creature share knowledge but not senses.
When the creature makes a check, you make the roll using your game statistics, not including any temporary bonuses or penalties.
The creature lasts until it drops to 0 hit points, at which point you lose a healing surge (or hit points equal to your surge value if you have no surges left). Otherwise, it lasts until you dismiss it as a minor action or until the end of the encounter.

Duelist's Dance.name: Duelist's Dance
Duelist's Dance.flavor: You slip through the planar firmament with ease, dancing away from your enemies’ attacks in much the same manner as the rakes and bravos that inhabit the Feywild’s strange cities.
Duelist's Dance.requirement: The power Duelist's Dance must be active in order to use this power.

Smothering Darkness.name: Smothering Darkness
Smothering Darkness.flavor: You reach into the Shadowfell and pull dark shadows around yourself. At the same time, that plane’s dark energy infuses your eyes, allowing you to see easily in the darkest night.
Smothering Darkness.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures except you. You also gain darkvision while the zone persists.
Smothering Darkness.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Spined Devil's Boon.name: Spined Devil's Boon
Spined Devil's Boon.flavor: You steal the essence of a spined devil, gaining wings and a protective layer of barbed quills.
Spined Devil's Boon.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a fly speed of 6, and any enemy that hits you with a melee attack takes 5 damage.

Armor of Summer's Glory.name: Armor of Summer's Glory
Armor of Summer's Glory.flavor: A suit of gleaming metal appears around you. The armor’s mirrorlike surface sends intense flashes of radiant light spearing through your enemies.
Armor of Summer's Glory.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against melee attacks and ranged attacks, you shed bright light in a radius of 10 squares, and you can use the secondary power once per round.
Armor of Summer's Glory.requirement: The power Armor of Summer's Glory must be active in order to use this power.

Vortex of Fire.name: Vortex of Fire
Vortex of Fire.flavor: A dancing column of flame sweeps through your enemies, burning those within its fiery core and trapping them there with its searing winds.
