Vortex of Fire.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes 10 fire damage and is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Vortex of Fire.moveAction: You can move the zone up to 3 squares.
Vortex of Fire.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Whispers of the Void.name: Whispers of the Void
Whispers of the Void.flavor: When you whisper the words of this spell, your enemy emits a hideous shriek as madness overwhelms it.
Whispers of the Void.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). Until this effect ends, the target rolls a d6 at the start of each of its turns to determine how it uses its standard action.
Whispers of the Void.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Death Shroud Aspect.name: Death Shroud Aspect
Death Shroud Aspect.flavor: As your foe attacks, your physical body fades and becomes ghostly. Your enemy’s attack passes through you, barely injuring you.
Death Shroud Aspect.trigger: You take damage from an attack.
Death Shroud Aspect.effect: You take only half the damage.

Diabolic Escape.name: Diabolic Escape
Diabolic Escape.flavor: You disappear in a burst of smoke, leaving your enemies open to a fiery rebuke.
Diabolic Escape.effect: Each target gains vulnerable 5 fire until the start of your next turn. You then teleport up to 10 squares.

Guise of the Laughing Fool.name: Guise of the Laughing Fool
Guise of the Laughing Fool.flavor: You dance a foolish jig and cackle with glee as you take on the guise of the laughing fool. Your foes realize you are a threat, but they are unable to attack such a ridiculous figure.
Guise of the Laughing Fool.effect: Until the end of your next turn or until you make an attack, you gain a +2 power bonus to speed and cannot be the target of melee attacks or ranged attacks.

Memory of Blades.name: Memory of Blades
Memory of Blades.flavor: A weightless iron shield crafted from a dozen sword blades appears on your arm. At your command, it unleashes shards of force that slice through your enemies.
Memory of Blades.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +3 shield bonus to AC and Reflex and can use the secondary power at will.
Memory of Blades.requirement: The power Memory of Blades must be active in order to use this power.
Memory of Blades.trigger: An enemy within 3 squares of you attacks you.
Memory of Blades.target: Each creature in the blast, which must include the triggering enemy
Memory of Blades.onHit: 10 force damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.

Nightshade Cloud.name: Nightshade Cloud
Nightshade Cloud.flavor: A thick cloud of smoke pours through the area, choking your enemies and filling their minds with visions of terror and madness.
Nightshade Cloud.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier poison damage, and the target’s mind becomes poisoned with madness (save ends). While under this effect, the target cannot shift, and if it ends its turn adjacent to an enemy, it is dazed until the end of its next turn.
Nightshade Cloud.effect: The blast creates a zone of lightly obscured squares that lasts until the end of the encounter. Whenever an enemy ends its turn in the zone, you can slide it 1 square as a free action.

Rain of Lead.name: Rain of Lead
Rain of Lead.flavor: The area around your enemies darkens as chunks of molten lead fall, searing them with agonizing heat even as the lead coating hardens.
Rain of Lead.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and the target is restrained (save ends). If the target takes 20 or more damage from a single source (including its own attacks), it can make an extra saving throw against this effect as a free action.
Rain of Lead.effect: The blast creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of the encounter.

Master of Magic.name: Master of Magic
Master of Magic.sourceRef: Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, Heroes of Shadow
Master of Magic.flavor: The secrets of the magic of the planes are revealed to you, allowing you to access any magic to suit your needs.
Master of Magic.target: You or one ally in the burst
Master of Magic.effect: Choose one of the following effects.

Armor of the Void.name: Armor of the Void
Armor of the Void.flavor: A suit of black plate armor appears on you. Its dull surface gives off no reflection or even the slightest glare, as if it consumes the light that falls upon it.
Armor of the Void.effect: You teleport each target up to 3 squares.
Armor of the Void.requirement: The power Armor of the Void must be active in order to use this power.

Soul Cutter.name: Soul Cutter
Soul Cutter.flavor: You pour a cascade of magic into your pact weapon, causing it to glow brightly with arcane energy as you slash into your enemy.
Soul Cutter.requirement: You must use this power with your pact weapon.
Soul Cutter.onHit: 6[W] + Charisma modifier damage. After rolling damage, you can reroll any of the damage dice but must use the new result.

Soul Step.name: Soul Step
Soul Step.flavor: As your enemy falls, you become a creature of wind and mist.
Soul Step.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, or an enemy adjacent to you drops to 0 hit points.
Soul Step.effect: You teleport a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier.
Soul Step.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Icy Skewer.name: Icy Skewer
Icy Skewer.flavor: Your strike imparts the deathly chill of winter on the target, hindering its attacks.
Icy Skewer.requirement: You must use this power with your blade of winter’s mourning.
Icy Skewer.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier cold damage. You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the target’s attacks until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier cold damage.
Icy Skewer.special: You can use this power as a melee basic attack.

Piercing Shard.name: Piercing Shard
Piercing Shard.flavor: As you pierce your enemy’s defenses, its perceptions of reality become twisted, cloaking you from its sight.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Illusion, Implement, Psychic, Weapon
Piercing Shard.requirement: You must use this power with your blade of winter’s mourning.
Piercing Shard.onHit:
2[W] + Charisma modifier cold and psychic damage.
Level 13: 3[W] + Charisma modifier cold and psychic damage.
Level 23: 4[W] + Charisma modifier cold and psychic damage.
Piercing Shard.effect: You are invisible to the target until the start of your next turn.

Winter's Retributive Escape.name: Winter's Retributive Escape
Winter's Retributive Escape.flavor: You lash out with the fury of a winter storm, leaving your foe frozen in your wake as you swirl away.
Winter's Retributive Escape.requirement: You must be holding your blade of winter’s mourning.
Winter's Retributive Escape.effect:
The target takes 5 + your Charisma modifier cold and psychic damage, and you teleport a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier.
Level 17: 10 + your Charisma modifier cold and psychic damage.
Level 27: 15 + your Charisma modifier cold and psychic damage.

Soul Feast.name: Soul Feast
Soul Feast.flavor: Your eyes glow a fiery red as you restore your vitality by stealing soul energy from a vanquished foe—energy meant for devilish beings.
Soul Feast.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, or an enemy adjacent to you drops to 0 hit points.
Soul Feast.effect:
You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 11: Temporary hit points equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: Temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Soul Feast.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Soul Eater.name: Soul Eater
Soul Eater.flavor: Your blade glows with fell energy as it devours your foe’s soul and transfers that life force to you.
Soul Eater.requirement: You must use this power with your blade of annihilation.
Soul Eater.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and you gain a +2 power bonus to your next attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.
Soul Eater.special: You can use this power as a melee basic attack.

Blazing Doom of the Void.name: Blazing Doom of the Void
Blazing Doom of the Void.flavor: You infuse your blade with hellish fire and pain. Infernal magic tugs at your enemy’s soul, making your attacks against the foe more damaging.
Blazing Doom of the Void.requirement: You must use this power with your blade of annihilation.
Blazing Doom of the Void.onHit:
2[W] + Charisma modifier fire and necrotic damage.
Level 13: 3[W] + Charisma modifier fire and necrotic damage.
Level 23: 4[W] + Charisma modifier fire and necrotic damage.
Blazing Doom of the Void.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to your next damage roll against the target before the end of your next turn.

Reflexive Hellstrike.name: Reflexive Hellstrike
Reflexive Hellstrike.flavor: You counterattack against an enemy, delivering a painful and fiery wound upon it.
Reflexive Hellstrike.requirement: You must be holding your blade of annihilation.
Reflexive Hellstrike.effect:
The target takes 5 + your Charisma modifier fire and necrotic damage, and you push it a number of squares up to your Constitution modifier.
Level 17: 10 + your Charisma modifier fire and necrotic damage.
Level 27: 15 + your Charisma modifier fire and necrotic damage.

Dire Fate.name: Dire Fate
Dire Fate.flavor: The death of one foe seals the fate of another as the stars guide your hands and mind to kill.
Dire Fate.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points ,or an enemy adjacent to you drops to 0 hit points.
Dire Fate.effect: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Dire Fate.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Resplendent Blade.name: Resplendent Blade
Resplendent Blade.flavor: Your sword flares with dazzling white light, and as you plunge it into your foe, your enemy bleeds brilliance.
Resplendent Blade.requirement: You must use this power with your starshadow blade.
Resplendent Blade.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and one enemy adjacent to the target takes radiant damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Resplendent Blade.special: You can use this power as a melee basic attack.

Wield the Warp.name: Wield the Warp
Wield the Warp.flavor: Your stab into open air and time a space warp to place your startled foe on the tip of your sword.
keywords: Arcane, Implement, Psychic, Radiant, Teleportation, Weapon
Wield the Warp.requirement: You must use this power with your starshadow blade.
Wield the Warp.onHit:
2[W] + Charisma modifier psychic and radiant damage, and you teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.
Level 13: 3[W] + Charisma modifier psychic and radiant damage.
Level 23: 4[W] + Charisma modifier psychic and radiant damage.

Gaze into Nothing.name: Gaze into Nothing
Gaze into Nothing.flavor: You pass your sword before your foe and starlike motes of darkness leap from it to enter your enemy’s eyes, leaving them black voids.
Gaze into Nothing.requirement: You must be holding your starshadow blade.
Gaze into Nothing.effect: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Moonfire Blade.name: Moonfire Blade
Moonfire Blade.flavor: The blade’s soft glow builds until it blazes with dread power. Each strike using this weapon slashes through your foe’s defenses.
Moonfire Blade.requirement: You must use this power with your sword of the White Well.
Moonfire Blade.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage. If the target ends its next turn adjacent to you, it takes radiant damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Moonfire Blade.special: You can use this power as a melee basic attack.

Well of Light.name: Well of Light
Well of Light.flavor: By spinning your blade in a complex pattern, you call forth the Lady’s favor in a brilliant white light.
Well of Light.requirement: You must use this power with your sword of the White Well.
Well of Light.onHit:
2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Level 13: 3[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Level 23: 4[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Well of Light.effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of your next turn. While in the aura, your enemies have vulnerable 3 radiant to your attacks.

Moonlit Escape.name: Moonlit Escape
Moonlit Escape.flavor: An enemy’s attacks stir the Lady’s heart, and she shelters you in her protective light.
Moonlit Escape.requirement: You must use this power with your sword of the White Well.
Moonlit Escape.effect: The target takes 5 + your Charisma modifier psychic and radiant damage. In addition, you become insubstantial until the start of your next turn, and you can shift 1 square.

Shadow Claws.name: Shadow Claws
Shadow Claws.flavor: A cloud of freezing shadow wraps around your foe, turning into a snarling beast that lashes out when that enemy tries to move.
Shadow Claws.onHit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage.
Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage.
Shadow Claws.effect: If the target moves during its next turn, it takes cold damage equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier or Intelligence modifier.

Hateful Shade.name: Hateful Shade
Hateful Shade.flavor: With a gesture, you wrap your enemy with a dark shroud that threatens to choke the life out of it.
Hateful Shade.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier force damage, and ongoing 5 force damage (save ends). The target can also take a move action to make an opposed Acrobatics check or Athletics check against you. If it succeeds, the ongoing damage ends.

Web of Shadows.name: Web of Shadows
Web of Shadows.flavor: Strands of darkness shroud the battlefield around your foes, forming a dense web of black tendrils that can hold any creature fast.
Web of Shadows.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Web of Shadows.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Web of Shadows.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any creature that willingly enters the zone is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Shade Twin.name: Shade Twin
Shade Twin.flavor: Darkness swirls around you. When it passes, you have taken on the guise of another creature.
Shade Twin.effect: You adopt the target’s appearance until the end of your next turn. Creatures that observe you using this power are aware that you have done so. You gain a +5 power bonus to Bluff checks related to mimicking the target. Whenever you take damage while you have adopted the target’s appearance, the target takes psychic damage equal to half the damage you take. Whenever the target takes damage from this effect, roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, the effect ends.
Shade Twin.sustainMinor: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Shard of Darkness.name: Shard of Darkness
Shard of Darkness.flavor: A frozen blade of raw shadowstuff appears in your hand, then cripples a foe with cold when it strikes.
Shard of Darkness.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Well of Shadows.name: Well of Shadows
Well of Shadows.flavor: A pool of darkness forms beneath your foes, clinging to them like something alive as they struggle to escape.
Well of Shadows.onHit: 5 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). If the target is already slowed, it is instead immobilized and takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends both).
Well of Shadows.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. Until the zone ends, you can use the secondary power at will.
Well of Shadows.requirement: The power Well of Shadows must be active in order to use this power.
Well of Shadows.trigger: An enemy enters the zone willingly or ends its turn there.

Shadow Ride.name: Shadow Ride
Shadow Ride.flavor: Your body flows as liquid darkness, pooling around another creature like a second shadow.
Shadow Ride.effect: You shift up to 2 squares and can enter any enemy’s space during this movement. You can end this movement in an enemy’s space. If you do so, whenever the enemy moves before the start of your next turn, you move with it, remaining in its space. You do not provoke opportunity attacks for this movement. At the start of your next turn, you appear in the nearest unoccupied square.

Walk Through Darkness.name: Walk Through Darkness
Walk Through Darkness.flavor: As you move, your body becomes shadow, slipping through foes and barriers with equal ease.
Walk Through Darkness.effect: You shift up to 10 squares. You are phasing and insubstantial during this shift.

Bridge of Shades.name: Bridge of Shades
Bridge of Shades.flavor: Twin pools of darkness shimmer to life at your command, creating a shadowy bridge between them.
Bridge of Shades.effect: Choose two squares in range. Until the end of your next turn, the two squares are considered to be adjacent to each other for the purpose of movement or making melee attacks. Moving from one square to the other is teleportation, although a creature doesn’t need to be able to see the destination square.

Shadow Armor.name: Shadow Armor
Shadow Armor.flavor: Shadow coalesces around you to take the form of a macabre suit of plate armor.
Shadow Armor.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to Stealth checks and a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter. As a minor action, you can end this effect and then teleport up to 5 squares. You then become invisible until the end of your next turn, or until you hit or miss with an attack roll.

Menacing Shadow.name: Menacing Shadow
Menacing Shadow.flavor: A shadowy figure arises at your command, leaping around the battlefield to leave your foes senseless.
Menacing Shadow.effect: You conjure a shadow in an unoccupied square within range. The shadow lasts until the end of the encounter. While the shadow persists, you can use the secondary power through the shadow once per round.
Menacing Shadow.moveAction: You move the shadow to an unoccupied square within 5 squares of you.
Menacing Shadow.requirement: The power Menacing Shadow must be active in order to use this power.
Menacing Shadow.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Oubliette of the Void.name: Oubliette of the Void
Oubliette of the Void.flavor: Walls of twisted shadow arise to entrap your enemies and scour their minds.
Oubliette of the Void.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts its turn in the zone and then willingly leaves the zone during its turn takes 10 psychic damage. While in the zone, enemies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls.
Oubliette of the Void.moveAction: You move the zone up to 3 squares.
Oubliette of the Void.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Offering of Blood.name: Offering of Blood
Offering of Blood.flavor: You grimace in pain as your magic exacts the price for correcting your misfortune.
Offering of Blood.trigger: You make an attack roll, a damage roll, or a skill check and dislike the result.
Offering of Blood.effect: You take damage equal to your level. You can then reroll the attack roll, damage roll, or skill check. You must use the new result.

Soul of the Void.name: Soul of the Void
Soul of the Void.flavor: A palpable feeling of death surrounds you as your soul seals its connection to the darkness.
Soul of the Void.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain a +5 power bonus to necrotic damage rolls, and you cannot regain hit points. In addition, the next time during this encounter that you start your turn at 0 hit points or fewer, you can spend a healing surge.

Shadow Mire.name: Shadow Mire
Shadow Mire.flavor: Dense shadowstuff swirls across the battlefield, capturing your enemies in a mire of dark energy.
Shadow Mire.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Shadow Mire.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Shadow Mire.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any creature that tries to leave the zone must roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, it cannot leave the zone during its current turn and its movement ends. Any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes 10 necrotic damage.

Star of Death's Omen.name: Star of Death's Omen
Star of Death's Omen.flavor: A pulsing black star appears above your enemy, marking its doom.
Star of Death's Omen.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Star of Death's Omen.onMiss: The power is not expended, and you gain a +2 power bonus to the next attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

Draining Void.name: Draining Void
Draining Void.flavor: A cloud of swirling darkness rises on the battlefield, utterly freezing any creature that lingers too long within it.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement, Necrotic, Shadow, Zone
Draining Void.onHit: 8d6 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage.
Draining Void.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is heavily obscured and blocks line of sight, and creatures inside the zone cannot attack creatures outside the zone. A creature that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes 15 cold and necrotic damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.
Draining Void.moveAction: You move the zone up to 3 squares.
Draining Void.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Legion.name: Shadow Legion
Shadow Legion.flavor: Shadow erupts from the ground at your command, becoming creatures of darkness that lunge at your foes.
Shadow Legion.effect: You conjure a shadow of each target, and each shadow lasts until the end of the encounter. A target’s shadow is the same size as the target and appears adjacent to the target. Each shadow has a melee basic attack identical to its target’s, and makes that attack against the target when it appears, with a +4 power bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll. An enemy takes 5 necrotic damage for each shadow adjacent to it or in its space at the end of its turn.

Echoing Dirge.name: Echoing Dirge
Echoing Dirge.flavor: Shadows swirl around your foes, drawing forth dark memories that cause them to recoil in fear.
Echoing Dirge.target: One or two creatures in the blast
Echoing Dirge.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

Shadow Warp.name: Shadow Warp
Shadow Warp.flavor: When a creature falls, you draw strength from its death to carry another creature across the battlefield.
Shadow Warp.trigger: You reduce a creature to 0 hit points, or an enemy adjacent to you drops to 0 hit points.
Shadow Warp.target: You or one creature in the burst
Shadow Warp.effect: You slide the target up to 3 squares.
Shadow Warp.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Hound of Dark Omen.name: Hound of Dark Omen
Hound of Dark Omen.flavor: Shadows and mist swirl around the target, coalescing into the form of a snarling hound that emits a dreadful howl.
Hound of Dark Omen.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
Hound of Dark Omen.gloomPact(Binder): The target takes psychic damage equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier if it doesn’t move before the end of its next turn.

Ebon Claws.name: Ebon Claws
Ebon Claws.flavor: At your command, clawed hands crafted from shadow wrap around your foe.
Ebon Claws.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Ebon Claws.gloomPact(Binder): Until the end of your turn, you can use a minor action to deal necrotic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier to one creature adjacent to the target.

Pall of Darkness.name: Pall of Darkness
Pall of Darkness.flavor: You encase your foe in a sphere of absolute darkness that steals away its life and sight.
Pall of Darkness.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Pall of Darkness.gloomPact(Binder): Until the end of your next turn, enemies grant combat advantage and cannot make opportunity attacks while adjacent to the target.

Haunting Shadow.name: Haunting Shadow
Haunting Shadow.flavor: A second shadow clings to your foe, becoming a beast of chilling darkness that claws at any creatures in reach.
Haunting Shadow.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and you slide the target up to 2 squares.
Haunting Shadow.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any creature that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes 5 cold damage.
Haunting Shadow.gloomPact(Binder): The target takes cold damage equal to 5 + your Dexterity modifier if it willingly moves on its next turn.

Devouring Tide.name: Devouring Tide
Devouring Tide.flavor: A stream of black motes erupts from your outstretched hand, rushing forward to swarm your foes like a cloud of ravenous insects.
Devouring Tide.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Devouring Tide.gloomPact(Binder): You also slide each target up to 3 squares.

Umbral Radiance.name: Umbral Radiance
Umbral Radiance.flavor: Shadow flows like liquid to smother and blind your foe, pulsing with a dead-black radiance.
Umbral Radiance.onHit: 2d12 + Charisma modifier necrotic and radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Umbral Radiance.gloomPact(Binder): Until the start of your next turn, you and your allies are invisible while within 3 squares of the target.

Umbral Swap.name: Umbral Swap
Umbral Swap.flavor: A bolt of frigid shadow swallows your foe, then lashes out at creatures that linger too near.
Umbral Swap.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and the target is removed from play until the end of your next turn.
Umbral Swap.gloomPact(Binder): Choose a square in the target’s space. Until the start of your next turn, any creature that ends its turn in that square or adjacent to it takes cold and necrotic damage equal to 10 + your Dexterity modifier.

Hidden Lore.name: Hidden Lore
Hidden Lore.flavor: You fade from the senses of your enemies, leaving them unaware of your presence.
Hidden Lore.trigger: You reduce a creature to 0 hit points, or an enemy adjacent to you drops to 0 hit points.
Hidden Lore.effect: You become invisible until the end of your next turn.
Hidden Lore.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Mind Shadows.name: Mind Shadows
Mind Shadows.flavor: Reality unravels into darkness around your enemy, breaking its grip on sanity.
Mind Shadows.onHit:
1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot see any of your allies who are 3 or more squares away from it.
Level 21: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

Shadow Tentacles.name: Shadow Tentacles
Shadow Tentacles.flavor: Darkness flares to produce a sphere of writhing tendrils that crush your foes in their icy grip.
Shadow Tentacles.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Shadow Tentacles.starPact(Binder): The burst also creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of your next turn.

Void Blast.name: Void Blast
Void Blast.flavor: A mote of darkness appears before you, then explodes to envelop your foes in a field of shadow and madness.
Void Blast.effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is heavily obscured and blocks line of sight.
Void Blast.starPact(Binder): Any creature other than you that ends its turn in the zone takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Cyst of Darkness.name: Cyst of Darkness
Cyst of Darkness.flavor: With a whispered incantation, you plant a seed of chilling darkness within your enemy.
Cyst of Darkness.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage.
Cyst of Darkness.starPact(Binder): At the start of your next turn, you slide the target up to 3 squares. The target and each creature adjacent to it at the end of the slide take cold and necrotic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Devouring Dark.name: Devouring Dark
Devouring Dark.flavor: Tentacles lash out from a sphere of darkness to harry any creatures in reach, crippling their ability to stand fast in combat.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement, Necrotic, Shadow, Zone
Devouring Dark.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage.
Devouring Dark.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Creatures grant combat advantage while in the zone.
Devouring Dark.starPact(Binder): Any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes 5 cold and necrotic damage.

Greater Void Burst.name: Greater Void Burst
Greater Void Burst.flavor: You punch a hole in reality through which the void pours forth, tearing apart the minds of any creatures caught within it.
Greater Void Burst.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is heavily obscured and blocks line of sight.
Greater Void Burst.starPact(Binder): Any creature other than you that ends its turn in the zone takes psychic damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.

Inner Void.name: Inner Void
Inner Void.flavor: Your foe’s frenzied scream is the only sign of the portal you open to the Far Realm—a portal that tears your enemy apart from the inside out.
Inner Void.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target falls prone.
Inner Void.starPact(Binder): The target takes extra necrotic damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.

Hungry Void.name: Hungry Void
Hungry Void.flavor: A dull black sphere of nothingness appears in the midst of combat, drawing all creatures toward it with an unearthly hunger.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement, Necrotic, Shadow, Zone
Hungry Void.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and the target falls prone.
Hungry Void.starPact(Binder): You can pull each target 1 square toward the center of the burst. The square at the center of the burst becomes a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes 15 cold and necrotic damage.

Malicious Shadow.name: Malicious Shadow
Malicious Shadow.flavor: Your attack tears a shroud of shadow from your foe, wrapping it to hinder its movement.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Conjuration, Implement, Necrotic, Shadow
Malicious Shadow.onHit: 10 cold and necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of its turn.
Malicious Shadow.effect: You conjure a malicious shadow in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The shadow lasts until the end of your next turn. While adjacent to the shadow, enemies grant combat advantage to you. While the shadow persists, you can use the secondary power through the shadow at will.
Malicious Shadow.sustainMinor: The shadow persists until the end of your next turn.
Malicious Shadow.requirement: The power Malicious Shadow must be active in order to use this power.
Malicious Shadow.trigger: An enemy willingly leaves a square adjacent to the shadow on its turn.

Shadow Blend.name: Shadow Blend
Shadow Blend.flavor: You draw forth shadow from the nearby darkness to conceal you from your foes.
Shadow Blend.trigger: You end your turn within 2 squares of a square of dim light or darkness.
Shadow Blend.effect: You gain partial concealment until the start of your next turn.

Deathly Conduit.name: Deathly Conduit
Deathly Conduit.flavor: Noxious black clouds roil around your foes both close and far, your power drawing you from one cloud to the other in the blink of an eye.
Deathly Conduit.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Deathly Conduit.effect: Each creature adjacent to you takes 10 necrotic damage, and you can teleport to an unoccupied square in the burst.

Mirror Darkly.name: Mirror Darkly
Mirror Darkly.flavor: Your shadowy double appears at a distance, letting you split your essence between two points on the battlefield.
Mirror Darkly.effect: You conjure a shade in an unoccupied square within range. The shade occupies its square and lasts until the end of your next turn. The shade can be attacked. It uses your defenses, and it is destroyed if it takes any damage. While the shade persists, you are insubstantial and you can use your space or the shade’s space as the origin of your attacks.
Mirror Darkly.aftereffect: You can teleport to a square formerly occupied by the shade.

Shade Dance.name: Shade Dance
Shade Dance.flavor: As you maneuver across the battlefield, you take on the form of living shadow to frustrate your foes’ attacks.
Shade Dance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you complete a move of at least 3 squares on your turn, you can become insubstantial until the start of your next turn.

Darkening Fetch.name: Darkening Fetch
Darkening Fetch.flavor: Shadows rise up to form monstrous shapes at your command, lashing a distant foe, then dragging it forward to face you.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement, Necrotic, Shadow, Teleportation
Darkening Fetch.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and you teleport the target to a square adjacent to you. The target is immobilized (save ends).
Darkening Fetch.onMiss: Half damage, and you pull the target up to 5 squares. The target is slowed (save ends).

Reaper's Vengeance.name: Reaper's Vengeance
Reaper's Vengeance.flavor: You turn a foe’s attack into opportunity, crossing the battlefield in a burst of shadow that conceals your deadly intent.
Reaper's Vengeance.trigger: An enemy damages you with an attack.
Reaper's Vengeance.effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy, then create a zone in a close burst 2 that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is heavily obscured to creatures other than you. In addition, you gain combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

Darklands Eclipse.name: Darklands Eclipse
Darklands Eclipse.flavor: A roiling black cloud erupts around your foes, creating a trap from which they struggle in vain to escape.
keywords: Arcane, Cold, Implement, Necrotic, Shadow, Teleportation, Zone
Darklands Eclipse.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 cold and necrotic damage (save ends both). Until this effect ends, whenever the target takes damage from an attack, you can teleport it as a free action to any square in the zone you create with this power.
Darklands Eclipse.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 cold and necrotic damage (save ends).
Darklands Eclipse.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is heavily obscured and blocks line of sight for creatures other than you.
Darklands Eclipse.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Drawn to Darkness.name: Drawn to Darkness
Drawn to Darkness.flavor: A veil of shadow swallows your foes, then spits them out scarred in body and mind.
Drawn to Darkness.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and the target is removed from play and takes ongoing 15 cold and necrotic damage (save ends both).
Drawn to Darkness.aftereffect: The target returns to play in the space it occupied or in the nearest unoccupied space, and it is dazed until the start of its next turn.
Drawn to Darkness.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed and takes ongoing 10 cold and necrotic damage (save ends both).

Convocation of Shadows.name: Convocation of Shadows
Convocation of Shadows.flavor: Each time an enemy falls before you, you call on its departing shade to pull you partway to the realm of darkness.
Convocation of Shadows.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, or an enemy adjacent to you drops to 0 hit points.
Convocation of Shadows.effect: You are insubstantial and phasing until the end of your next turn.

Flesh Rend.name: Flesh Rend
Flesh Rend.flavor: The tails of your scourge wrap around your foe, directing its painful retreat.
Flesh Rend.requirement: You must use this power with your scourge of exquisite agony.
Flesh Rend.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and you can slide the target 1 square. The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.
Flesh Rend.special: You can use this power as a melee basic attack.

Spirit Flay.name: Spirit Flay
Spirit Flay.flavor: As you lash out at your foes, the pain produced by your scourge manifests as concealing shadow.
keywords: Arcane, Implement, Necrotic, Psychic, Shadow, Weapon
Spirit Flay.requirement: You must use this power with your scourge of exquisite agony.
Spirit Flay.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Level 13: 2[W] + Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage.
Level 23: 3[W] + Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage.
Spirit Flay.effect: You gain partial concealment until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Scourge.name: Shadow Scourge
Shadow Scourge.flavor: When a nearby foe lashes out, your counterattack cloaks it in bonds of shadow that leave it at your mercy.
Shadow Scourge.requirement: You must be holding your scourge of exquisite agony.
Shadow Scourge.effect:
The target takes 5 + your Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage, and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Level 13: 10 + your Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage.
Level 23: 15 + your Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage.

Pandorym’s Cry.name: Pandorym’s Cry
Pandorym’s Cry.flavor: From a distance too far to measure, you evoke an echo of Pandorym’s birthing cry: a sound of madness incarnate.
Pandorym’s Cry.starPact: The target also grants combat advantage and is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Worms.name: Worms
Worms.flavor: For a moment, your foe is covered in biting, swarming, and crushing maggots that make up the infinite extradimensional body of the Worm That Walks.
Worms.onHit: 2d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and you regain 3 hit points.
Worms.starPact: Add your Intelligence modifier to the hit points regained.

Elder Constellation.name: Elder Constellation
Elder Constellation.flavor: A maddening pattern appears in the air, revealing a few flickering stars that preside over the end of everything. Space wavers, and your foes are caught up in the instability.
Elder Constellation.starPact: The target also grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Elder Constellation.effect: If you hit both targets, you can teleport them, swapping their positions.

Maggot Conduit.name: Maggot Conduit
Maggot Conduit.flavor: Holes devoured through space-time crawl with the green-white maggots of the Worm. You invoke a conduit, which manifests as a writhing pit of maggots beneath your foes.
Maggot Conduit.starPact: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes acid damage equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier (a creature can take this damage only once per turn).

Maw of Atropus.name: Maw of Atropus
Maw of Atropus.flavor: The World Born Dead consumes anything that it can reach. Your spell manifests a slavering maw of Atropus, which attempts to eat your foes.
Maw of Atropus.starPact: The target also takes a penalty to Fortitude until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals your Intelligence modifier.

Llymic’s Frigid Prison.name: Llymic’s Frigid Prison
Llymic’s Frigid Prison.flavor: A puff of icy air escapes from Father Llymic’s icy prison, foreshadowing when glaciers will cover all the worlds and remaining life will serve to feed the Father’s brood.
Llymic’s Frigid Prison.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Llymic’s Frigid Prison.starPact: You also regain hit points equal to twice your Intelligence modifier.

Malicious Guide Star.name: Malicious Guide Star
Malicious Guide Star.flavor: An apocalyptic starscape waits for the world’s end. That inevitable end draws a little closer each time you conjure a malicious spark to guide your foes to ruination.
Malicious Guide Star.effect: You activate an aura 1 on the target. The aura lasts until the end of your next turn, and the target cannot deactivate it. The target and any of your enemies grant combat advantage while in the aura. In addition, you can teleport the target or another creature in the aura up to 5 squares as a move action.
Malicious Guide Star.sustainMinor: The aura persists until the end of your next turn.

Pandorym’s Prism.name: Pandorym’s Prism
Pandorym’s Prism.flavor: A purple crystal intrudes on reality, shining with fell light and turning the one who looks upon it into a dull receptacle for your will.
Pandorym’s Prism.onHit: 2d6 + Constitution modifier psychic and radiant damage, and the target makes a basic attack as a free action against a creature of your choice.
Pandorym’s Prism.starPact: The target also takes a penalty to Will until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals your Intelligence modifier.

Grasp of Ragnorra.name: Grasp of Ragnorra
Grasp of Ragnorra.flavor: Ragnorra misses her brood and ecstatically reaches into the world to claim substitutes and visit upon them the terrible love she has for her true children.
Grasp of Ragnorra.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier necrotic and thunder damage, and the target is removed from play until the end of your next turn. It then reappears in its original space or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
Grasp of Ragnorra.starPact: You decide where the target reappears, choosing an unoccupied space within 20 squares of you.

Accursed Affinity.name: Accursed Affinity
keywords: Personal   Prerequisite: Elemental Pact  Trigger: An enemy under your Warlock’s Curse is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer  Effect: The next enemy you place your Warlock’s Curse on gains vulnerable 5 to the damage type matching your current elemental affinity. This vulnerability is cumulative with the enemy’s existing vulnerability to the same damage type, if any, and lasts until the curse ends. The vulnerability increases to 10 at 11th level and 15 at 21st level.
Accursed Affinity.trigger: An enemy under your Warlock’s Curse is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer
Accursed Affinity.effect: The next enemy you place your Warlock’s Curse on gains vulnerable 5 to the damage type matching your current elemental affinity. This vulnerability is cumulative with the enemy’s existing vulnerability to the same damage type, if any, and lasts until the curse ends. The vulnerability increases to 10 at 11th level and 15 at 21st level.

Chromatic Bolt.name: Chromatic Bolt
Chromatic Bolt.flavor: You loose a crackling bolt of raw chaos against your foes.
Chromatic Bolt.onHit:
1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and one creature within 5 squares of the target takes psychic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and psychic damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Warding Chaos.name: Warding Chaos
Warding Chaos.flavor: Energy flares from a dying enemy, warding you against elemental damage.
Warding Chaos.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, or an enemy adjacent to you drops to 0 hit points.
Warding Chaos.effect: You gain resist 5 acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder until the end of your next turn. You can shift up to a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Warding Chaos.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Unraveling Strike.name: Unraveling Strike
Unraveling Strike.flavor: Brilliant colors flare around your blade, rending your enemy’s defenses to create an opening for your next attack.
Unraveling Strike.requirement: You must use this power with your blade of chaos.
Unraveling Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder. The target gains vulnerable 3 to that damage type until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.
Unraveling Strike.special: You can use this power as a melee basic attack.

Elemental Wrath.name: Elemental Wrath
Elemental Wrath.flavor: Your serrated blade shreds an enemy’s resistances to the elements while surrounding you with destructive energy.
keywords: Arcane, Aura, Elemental, Implement, Varies, Weapon
Elemental Wrath.requirement: You must use this power with your blade of chaos.
Elemental Wrath.special: Each time you use this power, choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. The power’s damage is that type.
Elemental Wrath.onHit:
2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target loses any resistance or immunity to this power’s damage type until the end of your next turn.
Level 13: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage.
Level 23: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage.
Elemental Wrath.effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the aura or starts its turn there takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Elemental Roar.name: Elemental Roar
Elemental Roar.flavor: A terrible howling tears into your enemy’s mind in retribution for its attack.
Elemental Roar.requirement: You must be holding your blade of chaos.
Elemental Roar.effect:
5 + your Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Level 17: 10 + your Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Level 27: 15 + your Charisma modifier psychic damage.

Yan-C-Bin’s Breath.name: Yan-C-Bin’s Breath
Yan-C-Bin’s Breath.flavor: You exhale a cloud of roiling green vapor that melts anything it touches.
Yan-C-Bin’s Breath.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Yan-C-Bin’s Breath.effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain for creatures other than you. Each creature other than you that ends its turn in the zone takes 5 acid damage.
Yan-C-Bin’s Breath.sustainMinor: Roll a d6. On an odd result, reduce the zone’s size by 1 square. On an even result, increase the zone’s size by 1 square. If the zone occupies 0 squares, it ends. Otherwise, the zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Stony Roots.name: Stony Roots
Stony Roots.flavor: You draw elemental earth through your body to ensure that nothing can dislodge you from your position.
Stony Roots.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can ignore forced movement, and you can make a saving throw when an attack would knock you prone. On a save, you don’t fall prone.

Tentacles of Cryonax.name: Tentacles of Cryonax
Tentacles of Cryonax.flavor: The temperature plummets as two ghastly, white tentacles emerge from out of nowhere to grab your enemies.
Tentacles of Cryonax.effect: You conjure two icy tentacles, each in an unoccupied square in the burst. The tentacles persist until the end of your next turn. Each creature other than you that starts its turn adjacent to a tentacle takes 5 cold damage, and it is slowed until the end of its next turn. While a tentacle persists, you can use the secondary power through it.
Tentacles of Cryonax.sustainMinor: Roll a d6. On a 1, remove one tentacle. On a 6, add one tentacle to an unoccupied square within 10 squares of you. If you have one or more tentacles remaining, the effect persists until the end of your next turn. Otherwise, the effect ends.
Tentacles of Cryonax.requirement: The power Tentacles of Cryonax must be active in order to use this power.
Tentacles of Cryonax.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage, the tentacle pulls the target 1 square, and the target is grabbed (save ends).

Chaos Armor.name: Chaos Armor
Chaos Armor.flavor: Power flows around you, girding you against the elements and lashing your enemies.
Chaos Armor.effect: Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 10 to the chosen damage type. In addition, whenever an enemy hits you with an attack during your turn, one enemy within 5 squares of you takes damage of the chosen type equal to your Constitution modifier.

Murky Deep.name: Murky Deep
Murky Deep.flavor: A bead of moisture appears above your head and expands into great shimmering strands of befouled water.
Murky Deep.effect: The burst creates a zone of lightly obscured squares that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you shift without leaving the zone, you can shift up to 2 additional squares in the zone. Any enemy that enters the zone or starts its turn there is slowed until the start of its next turn. A creature that has a swim speed ignores this effect.
Murky Deep.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Dream of Mual-Tar.name: Dream of Mual-Tar
Dream of Mual-Tar.flavor: A horrific serpent of lightning and thunder uncoils before you.
keywords: Arcane, Elemental, Implement, Lightning, Thunder, Zone
Dream of Mual-Tar.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier lightning damage, and ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).
Dream of Mual-Tar.eachFailedSavingThrow: Each creature adjacent to the target takes thunder damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Dream of Mual-Tar.effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. While in the zone, creatures other than you have vulnerable 5 lightning and vulnerable 5 thunder.
Dream of Mual-Tar.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn. Roll a d6. On a 1, each creature in the zone can shift 1 square as a free action. On a 6, each creature other than you in the zone is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Heart of the Storm.name: Heart of the Storm
Heart of the Storm.flavor: A forceful wind shoves back the creatures around you to provide you an exit.
Heart of the Storm.effect: You push each target 1 square. You then fly up to 8 squares.

Baleful Eye of Imix.name: Baleful Eye of Imix
Baleful Eye of Imix.flavor: A great fiery eye opens, and as the eye winks, it erupts in a burst of flames.
Baleful Eye of Imix.effect: You conjure a Large eye of Imix in an unoccupied space in range. The eye persists until the end of your next turn. Each creature other than you that starts its turn adjacent to the eye takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends). Any creature that enters the eye’s space takes 10 fire damage and can then teleport up to 5 squares as a free action. Until the effect ends, you can use the secondary power.
Baleful Eye of Imix.sustainMinor: The eye persists until the end of your next turn. Roll a d6. On a 1, you cannot use the secondary power on your next turn. On a 6, creatures within 3 squares of the eye take fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Baleful Eye of Imix.requirement: The power Baleful Eye of Imix must be active in order to use this power.
Baleful Eye of Imix.onHit: 4d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and the eye pulls the target up to 2 squares.

Fury of Ogrémoch.name: Fury of Ogrémoch
Fury of Ogrémoch.flavor: The ground trembles and dust chokes the air as Ogrémoch’s wrath encases your enemies and then explodes each stony casing in a spray of jagged shards.
Fury of Ogrémoch.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is instead restrained (save ends).
Fury of Ogrémoch.secondFailedSavingThrow: The target is instead petrified (save ends).
Fury of Ogrémoch.aftereffect: As a free action, make the following attack, which is a close burst 2 centered on the target.
Fury of Ogrémoch.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier damage. If the target was restrained by this power, this attack deals 1d6 extra damage to it. If the target was petrified by this power, this attack deals 2d6 extra damage to it.

Cloud Sight.name: Cloud Sight
Cloud Sight.flavor: You draw power from the dying that allows you to exert your will over the minds of other creatures, confusing their perceptions.
Cloud Sight.trigger: You reduce a creature to 0 hit points, or an enemy adjacent to you drops to 0 hit points.
Cloud Sight.effect: The target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls made against you until the end of your next turn.
Cloud Sight.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Fascinating Shadows.name: Fascinating Shadows
Fascinating Shadows.flavor: You create a dizzying array of images out of the shadows, lulling your enemies into drawing closer.
Fascinating Shadows.target: One or two creatures in the blast
Fascinating Shadows.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target up to 2 squares. The first time the target attacks you before the end of your next turn, it takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Unseelie Sprites.name: Unseelie Sprites
Unseelie Sprites.flavor: You call forth a group of tiny, shadow-winged sprites that swarm around your enemies and lash out at them with poison-tipped spears.
Unseelie Sprites.feyPact(Binder): The target also takes poison damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Lure of Loyalty.name: Lure of Loyalty
Lure of Loyalty.flavor: You lay a wreath of shadowy confusion over your enemy, drawing it closer and commanding its temporary loyalty.
Lure of Loyalty.onHit: You pull the target up to 4 squares to a square adjacent to you, and the first time an enemy attacks you before the end of your next turn, the target must charge that enemy or make a basic attack against it as a free action.
Lure of Loyalty.feyPact(Binder): You slide the target up to 3 squares before it makes this attack.
Lure of Loyalty.effect: The target cannot attack you until the end of your next turn.

Touch of Command.name: Touch of Command
Touch of Command.flavor: You touch the one who would dare to strike you, bringing them under your spell.
Touch of Command.onHit: The target is dominated until the end of its next turn.
Touch of Command.feyPact(Binder): The target also takes psychic damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.

Nightmare Vines.name: Nightmare Vines
Nightmare Vines.flavor: You conjure up nightmarish vines that seize upon your enemies and hold them still long enough for you to walk by.
Nightmare Vines.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier poison and psychic damage.
Nightmare Vines.feyPact(Binder): The target is also restrained and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.

Fleeting Call.name: Fleeting Call
Fleeting Call.flavor: You utter an enticing whisper, lacing it with the allure of dark fey creatures, fleeing quickly when your enemies get too close.
Fleeting Call.target: One or two creatures in the burst
Fleeting Call.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target up to 2 squares.
Fleeting Call.feyPact(Binder): Until the end of your next turn, you become invisible, gain phasing, and can occupy the same space as other creatures. These effects end if you make an attack.

Song of the Siren.name: Song of the Siren
Song of the Siren.flavor: You wrap your will around an enemy’s mind, enthralling it with your very presence and preying upon its newfound dedication to you.
Song of the Siren.onHit: Whenever one of your enemies ends its turn adjacent to you, the target must shift up to its speed and make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an opportunity action. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.
Song of the Siren.feyPact(Binder): You can choose for the target to charge an enemy instead of shifting and making a basic attack. You can make this choice for each enemy the target must attack.
Song of the Siren.onMiss: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Unwilling Betrayal.name: Unwilling Betrayal
Unwilling Betrayal.flavor: You wait until an enemy is close enough to touch before turning them against their own allies.
Unwilling Betrayal.onHit: The target is dominated until the end of its next turn. If one of your enemies other than the target is within range of the triggering attack, the triggering attack hits that enemy instead.
Unwilling Betrayal.feyPact(Binder): The target also takes psychic damage equal to 8 + your Intelligence modifier.

Supplication of the Worms.name: Supplication of the Worms
Supplication of the Worms.flavor: You tug on the hearts of the enemies around you, drawing them closer so that they can kneel before you in adoration.
Supplication of the Worms.onHit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target up to 2 squares and knock it prone.
Supplication of the Worms.feyPact(Binder): You become invisible and teleport up to your speed. The invisibility lasts until the end of your next turn or until you attack.

Command Insanity.name: Command Insanity
Command Insanity.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Command Insanity.flavor: Your eyes reflect the madness of the Far Realm, crushing your enemy’s will with the overwhelming weight of insanity.
Command Insanity.onHit: The target is dominated (save ends). If the target is aberrant, it takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against this effect.
